skem byed khyab 'jug phag mo zhes/ /bya ba dkyil 'khor bdun par gzhag /grong khyer de yi nang dag tu/ /chu klung 'gram dang ldan par bri/ /grwa rnams shar byang grwa dag dang / /lho dang nub phyogs phyin par bya/ /sdig can chu na gnas pa'i nang / /ngoms mi shes pa'i

shig /nang du ma chu btsugs phyogs gcig gnas/ /de nang khyu mchog 'gro bar bya/ /rlung lha'i phyogs kyi gnas gcig tu/ /bde byed lha mo khyu mchog dang / /de bzhin ra dang bum rna gnyis/ /grong khyer gyi ni sgo srung gzhag /klung gi g.yas rol 'gram

dag tu/ /rig sngags chen po bu smad bcas/ /dbang ldan phyogs su gzhag bya ste/ /dkyil 'khor bdun pa 'das pa yin/ /dkyil 'khor brgyad pa sngar bshad pa'i/ /'byung po'i bya bsgrub pa bdun/ /'byung po sna tshogs bskor ba gzhag /dgu par yang ni rim

bzhin bri/ /de nas dkyil 'khor bcu par ni/ /tshangs pa'i drang srong rnams kyang gzhag /de nas gshin rje tshogs mang bcas/ /bcu gcig par ni gzhag par bya/ /me lce 'bar bas bskor ba yi/ /me lce lha mo'i tshogs kyis bskor/ /me de mthu las skyes pa ste/ /

de ni bcu gnyis shes par bya/ /rnams kyi 'khor dang bcas/ /dag kyang gzhag par bya/ /lag na rdo rjes bshad pa bzhin/ /de ni bcu gsum shes par bya/ /zla ba phyogs bzang stobs po che/ /khyab 'jug dbang po nye dbang gnyis/ /rgyal

ba'i dbang po sangs rgyas kyi/ /blo gros lha mo gnyis kyang gzhag /gang na lhan bang gnyis gnas pa/ /de ni bcu bzhir shes par bya/ /lnga pa yi dkyil 'khor du/ /klu chen rigs brgyad dgod par bya/ /bka' stsol pa zhes bya ba yi/ /tshangs pa'i srin rnams bcu

drug tu/ /bcu bdun pa yi dkyil 'khor du/ /ka ta ya na gzhag par bya/ /de yi 'khor ni gang yin pa/ /de yang drung du gzhag par bya/ /dbang phyug chen po'i chung mar bcas/ /dbang ldan phyogs su gzhag bya ste/ /de ni brgyad shes par bya/ /de nas phyi rol rig

sngags rigs/ /rig sngags kyi ni sna tshogs dge/ /bcu dgu par ni gzhag par bya/ /de nas kyang ni rig sngags rnams/ /ming smos 'di dag la sogs bri/ /dri gshed thabs kyis dri gshed dang / /ro langs mar ni grags pa dang / /dkar mo chen mo dkar mo

dang / /gzhan yang sa steng gnas rnams gzhag /rdo rje'i mnga' bdag dgyes pa yi/ /gzhan gyi rigs sngags mchog 'ching ba/ /rab tu gsal zhing 'bar ba de/ /dbus der mkhas pas gzhag par bya/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin chen rje/ /nyi shu par ni

gzhag par bya/ /gang na rdo rje 'dzin gnas te/ /ming ni rdo rje pho brang yin/ /nyi shu gcig pa'i byang phyogs su/ /ku be ra ni tshogs bcas bri/ /ku be ra ni gar gnas pa/ /grong khyer lcang lo can zhes bya/ /klu yi bya bsgrub pa brgyad/ /grong khyer nyi shu gnyis par gzhag /

bya ba sgrub bcas klu chen rnams/ /lnga po nyi shu gsum par gzhag /dkyil 'khor nyi shu rtsa bzhir ni/ /klu yi dkyil 'khor gzhag par bya/ /klu mgo yi ni gdengs ka can/ /klu chen gyis ni g.yas su bskor/ /dkyil 'khor de yi nang dag tu/ /klu chen kha dog sna

tshogs pa/ /mtha' yas nor rgyas pad+ma dang / /de bzhin nor bu la sogs klu/ /ka lpa la dang rab mgyogs gnyis/ /de bzhin gzhan yang klu rnams kyi/ /ma dang rgyal tshab 'jog po yang / /dkyil 'khor nang du gzhag par bya/ /shar sgor 'od ma'i rtse mo

gzhag /dga' skyed pa ni lho phyogs su/ /nub phyogs su ni legs mthong gzhag /byang phyogs su ni stobs kyis rgyu/ /de nas rlung lha'i phyogs dag tu/ /'byung po'i tshogs ni bdun rnams dgod/ /de ni nyi shu lnga pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor du yang grags pa yin/ /

dkyil 'khor nyi shu rtsa lnga pa/ /'di dag kyang ni mkhas pa yis/ /ci rigs par ni bri bya zhing / /rdzogs byed rnams kyang legs par bri/ /chu lha'i phyogs su ni ma bri/ /shar phyogs su ni zla ba gzhag/ /ku ru na ni gling bzhir ni/ /phyogs mtshams dag tu gzhag par bya/ /

lhag ma dag ni byang phyogs su/ /nges par yang ni dgod par bstan/ /'di dag rnams ni mdor bsdu na/ /khor yug gi ni khong nas dbyung / /de nas rdo rje shugs kyis ni/ /der ni stobs chen 'gro bar bya/ /bang rim la ni song nas kyang / /dang po legs par dgod par bya/ /

rdzong gi 'phags ma don grub pa/ /dur khrod gnas na drag mo ni/ /bden bral phyogs su gzhag bya zhing / /ma yang drung du gzhag par bya/ /phyogs kyi lha ni bye ba rnams/ /dbang ldan phyogs su dgod par bya/ /log 'dren drag po chen po yang / /dkyil 'khor du ni

legs par dgod/ /rlung lha'i phyogs su mkha' lding gzhag /de nas dang po skyong ba yi/ /rdzong gi 'phags ma gnyis pa yang / /yongs su rdzogs par gzhag par bya/ /bang rim dag ni gnyis pa la/ /rdo rje'i shugs kyis bsgom bya zhing / /klu rigs nor bu gzhag

par bya/ /mtha' yas bden bral phyogs su gzhag /de nas phyogs kyi lha nyid ni/ /gshin rje'i phyogs su legs par gzhag /de nas tshogs rnams kyang / /me yi phyogs su gzhag par bya/ /de nas cho ga shes pa yis/ /kyi ni rigs

rnams dgod/ /brjed byed kyi ni rigs rnams dang / /nam gru dag gi rigs kyang gzhan/ /dbang ldan 'byung po rnams dang ni/ /'byung po'i chang khyu rnams kyang gzhag /tshangs pa'i srin po zhes bya rnams/ /dkyil 'khor byang phyogs dgod par bya/ /phyi rol klu yi rigs rnams kyang / /

rlung lha'i phyogs su legs par dgod/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa gnyis pa las/ /bang rim 'di ni yongs su rdzogs/ /rdo rje rim gyis bsgoms nas ni/ /gsum pa yang ni bden bral phyogs/ /sha za bzhag ste song na yang / /rnal 'byor mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor gzhag /

kyi ni khyim rnams kyang / /gshin rje'i phyogs su legs par dgod/ /me yi phyogs su dkyil 'khor du/ /stobs chen lha ma yin rnams gzhag /de nas dpal ldan 'jig rten skyong / /'jig rten chos las phyir phyogs pa/ /yul 'khor srung ni dpag med pa'i/ /

dri zar lhan cig kun tu dgod/ /dbang phyug chen mor bcas pa yi/ /dbang ldan phyogs su gnas par bya/ /de nas rig sngags rnams kyi bdag /lag na rdo rje rnal 'byor che/ /grogs bcas rdo rje 'dzin pa yi/ /rdo rje pho brang dga' bar gzhag /de nas stobs chen

'jig rten skyong / /dpal ldan 'jig rten chos spangs pa/ /lag na rdo rje 'dzin pa yi/ /dbang ldan byang gi phyogs su gzhag /de bzhin lcang lo can dag tu/ /nor sbyin tshogs dang bcas par bri/ /klu rnams ma ni su ru sa/ /rlung lha'i phyogs su gnas

par bya/ /de dag bu dang bcas par ni/ /de yi drung du dgod par bshad/ /mkha' lding rnam par 'dud pa'i bu/ /mthu rtsal shin tu rdzogs pa'ang gzhag /de nas 'byung po'i tshogs rnams dgod/ /chu lha yang ni nub phyogs gzhag/ /gsum pa dag kyang 'das pa yin/ /bzhi

pa dag gis bshad par bya/ /bang rim bzhi pa'i steng dag tu/ /rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni/ /nyi ma rnams ni g.yog dang bcas/ /chu lha'i phyogs su gnas par bya/ /bden bral phyogs su srin rnams dgod/ /de yi pha rol grul bum gzhag /de nas grul bum

lcags can yang / /lho phyogs su ni gzhag par bya/ /me yi phyogs su rlung lha gzhag /shar phyogs zla ba 'khor dang bcas/ /thags ris kyang de bzhin te/ /de gnyis kyis ni bzhi pa dgang / /de nas bang rim ldan pa la/ /rdo rje shugs kyis 'gro bar bya/ /

lha bsrung phyir ni klu rnams kyang / /chu lha'i phyogs su dgod par bya/ /dbang ldan dang ni shar mtshams su/ /lha yi mdzod kyang gzhag par bya/ /gzhan gyis mi thub rdo rje che/ /dbang ldan phyogs su gzhag par bya/ /de nas rdo rje'i drung dag tu/ /gnas gtsang ris

kyi lha chen gzhag /lha yi srungs ma gnod sbyin che/ /byang phyogs dag tu gnas par bya/ /rdo rje shugs kyis drug pa la/ /song nas chu lha'i phyogs dag tu/ /klu rgyal rgya mtsho chen po'i bu/ /drag cing shugs dang ldan pa gzhag /der ni g.yog dang bcas par bya/ /

gzhan dag gis ni sprul pa la/ /dbang byed lha ni gang yin rnams/ /bden bral phyogs su gnas par bya/ /tshangs ris kyi ni tshogs rnams kyang / /me yi phyogs su dgod par bya/ /tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa yi/ /lha rnams shar phyogs gzhag par bya/ /shin

tu mthong lha dbang ldan du/ /srid rtse de yi pha rol dgod/ /de bzhin dka' zlog byang phyogs gzhag /drug pa dag kyang 'das pa yin/ /bang rim dag ni bdun pa la/ /rdo rje shugs kyis rdo rje 'chang / /song nas khru yi gtso bo ni/ /rgya mtsho chen po rmad byung gzhag /

byang phyogs bya ba zin nas ni/ /grags shing bsod nams che ba yi/ /'phrul dga' ba yi lha chen rnams/ /gshin rje'i phyogs su gnas par bya/ /de nas rdo rje shar phyogs kyi/ /gnas kyi gtso bor gzhag par bya/ /sum cu gsum pa'ang shar phyogs su/ /

bzhag cing bdun pa yongs su dgang / /lha rnams sna tshogs rgyas pa yi/ /ri yi dbang po dam pa yi/ /bang rim dag ni yongs su rdzogs/ /de yi 'og tu bya ba bshad/ /ri rab steng du thams cad mkhyen/ /rig sngags snying po 'chang ba po/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten

rtogs mdzad pa/ /thar pa'i grong khyer dbang phyug gzhag /gang gi 'od zer de dag gi/ /phyogs rnams thams cad rgyas mdzad dang / /gang gi sku la mtshan kun gyi/ /mdzod rnams thams cad 'byung ba dang / /mtshan dang gzhon dang brtson 'grus dang / /gzhan yang

zhi bar ldan pa dang / /mchog rnams mchog sbyin byed pa la/ /gang gis mchog gi mchog sbyin dang / /thugs rje che dang ldan pa'i mgon/ /nyi ma 'char ka'i 'od dang 'dra/ /'od zer nyi ma bye ba yis/ /gang gis mun pa bsal pa dang / /chos dang mtshan nyid rigs

pa yi/ /yid bzhin nor bu'i thugs mnga' gang / /gang gis bskal pa grangs med par/ /sems can rnams ni rab tu bsrungs/ /rin chen in+d+ra nI la ltar/ /gang gi gtsug tor mdzes pa dang / /nor bu yi ni rgyal po bzhin/ /zla mdog can gyi mdzod srung sna/ /

gang gi bdud rtsi gtong ba'i zhal/ /pad+ma rA ga'i mdog 'dra dang / /dus mtshams gser gyis bsgyur ba yi/ /gser gyi ri ltar sku mdog mdzes/ /'khor lo chen po rtsibs stong pas/ /phyag dang zhabs ni legs spras pa/ /skyil mo krung ni mdzes pa yis/ /

thub pa chen po legs par bzhugs/ /chos kyi chu klung chen po'i mchog /de yi zhal nas kun tu 'bab/ /rmad du byung bar 'bab pa ste/ /bdag gis kha ni stong phrag rnams/ /stong snyed kyis ni brjod pa 'am/ /khong du chud par nus mi 'gyur/ /de ni rgyas

par 'gengs pa dang / /ye shes pha mtha' bla na med/ /shin tu rmad byung gsang bar bshad/ /tshig ldan gyi ni lha mo de/ /'jig rten mgon po sangs rgyas kyi/ /gsung la rab tu gnas pa yin/ /'jig rten gsum ma bdag mchog sbyin/ /'jig rten gsum gyis phyag

byas pa/ /'di ni gnas dang 'gro ba yi/ /'jig rten thams cad 'dzin pa yin/ /che ba'i che mchog stobs chen te/ /dga' zhing kun gyi tshig la gnas/ /gzhan gcig sangs rgyas 'dra ba med/ /gud na yang ni gnas ma yin/ /de yi bsngags pa sangs rgyas sam/ /

lha rnams nyid kyis brjod par nus/ /mchog sbyin 'jig rten gsum gyi ma/ /nyes pa thams cad rnam par spangs/ /mdor na 'gro ba 'di kun ni/ /khyod kyi rang bzhin nyid yin te/ /lha dang dri za klu dbang dang / /gnod sbyin lha min tshogs bskor ba'i/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu rnams kyi

gter/ /ya mtshan las kyi dkyil 'khor ni/ /der gtogs der ni brtson zhing spro/ /de dang 'brel bar the tshom med/ /chos klung bsod nams ldan pa de/ /bsod nams rin chen dag gis rgyas/ /lag na rdo rje'i bsod nams kyi/ /las kyi rgya mtsho dag las 'byung / /chu

klung rgya mtshor 'bab pa na/ skye bos bsten nas 'bab par 'gyur/ /de bzhin chos kyi chu klung 'di/ /'di dag gis bsten byas nas kyang / /lag na rdo rje'i mgo bo dang / /rna gnyis dang ni gsum du dbab/ /zer ma 'phros pas lha mo dang / dbang phyug tshogs bcas phog

par 'gyur/ /de phyir chos kyi chu klung 'di/ /sangs rgyas las ni 'byung byas la/ /lag na rdo rje'i mgo bor yang / /rab tu dbab cing bdug par bya'i/ /bsod nams ldan pa'i chu klung rgya chen de nyid las/ /skye bo mtha' dag gcig tu sems btud nyan par byed/ /de nyid la ni

lha rnams thams cad mngon par dga'/ /de nyid la ni rig sngags grub pa'i tshogs kun brten/ /gnas rnams gsum pa 'di ni lha yi gnas yin te/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa nga yi dgongs pa bzhin du rdzogs/ /de nas dam tshig mkhyen pas dkyil 'khor rgyal po yi/ /gsang ba

gang dang gang gsungs dga' rgyas bdag gis bshad/ /lag na rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen po dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po las gnas gsum pa rdzogs so// //ri rab kyi ni byang phyogs su/ /chos kyi klung chen 'dzin pa yi/ /rdo rje 'dzin chen rab

gtum pa/ /stobs chen lag na rdo rje gzhag /de yi rkang pa g.yon pa yis/ /dbang phyug chen po mnan par bya/ /g.yas pa yi ni rkang pa yis/ /lha mo dka' zlog mnan par bya/ /ri yi dbang po 'khor yug dang / /bang rim dag gi bar dag tu/ /gling chen

rnam pa bzhi po dang / /gnas rnams ji bzhin gzhag par bya/ /de nas chu klung bdun yang gzhag /lho phyogs su ni dbyibs legs pa'i/ /'dzam bu gling ni gzhag par bya/ /chu klung dang ni shing dang yul/ /sna tshogs kyis ni shin tu rgyas/ /de yi mngon mtshan chen po ni/ /'dzam

bu'i shing mchog skyes pa de/ /'phang du dpag tshad brgya yod do/ /'og logs su ni gzhag par bya/ /de nas chu klung bdun yang gzhag /nags tshal yang ni bdun dag dang / /yid du 'ong ba'i ri bdun dang / /yul bdun dag kyang gzhag par bya/ /dang po byang nas brtsam

bya zhing / /lho phyogs logs su thur du drang / /shar nas nub tu drang bya zhing / /kho ra khor yug bsgrubs nas ni/ /rgyal ba'i gsung rab yid 'ong ba/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rjes bsgrub pa/ /'phags pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ /snying rje'i bdag nyid pad+ma'i mchog /dge

slong dge slong ma rnams dang / /rgyal po dag gis bsten pa gzhag /'dzam bu gling gi lho phyogs su/ /khri shing dag kyang bri bar bya/ /nub phyogs su ni ba lang spyod/ /chu bo brgyas ni gang ba dang / /yul dang skye bo stong dag dang / /ban lang khyu ni stong gis rgyas/ /de

bzhin shar gyi lus 'phags kyang / /shar phyogs su ni gzhag par bya/ /yul rnams dang ni ri dag gis/ /kun tu rab tu rgyas par gnas/ /de nas gnas brtan chos skyong ba/ /bcu gnyis dag dang lhan cig tu/ /sgra gcan 'dzin zhes grags

pa ste/ /sangs rgyas sras ni mngon sum gnas/ /gnod sbyin lha min lto 'phye rnams/ /nyin mtshan du ni der song nas/ /dri dang phreng ba dpe med pas/ /mchod pa byed cing phyag kyang 'tshal/ /de nas byang gi sgra mi snyan/ /lhun po yi ni byang phyogs gzhag /gtsang

zhing gru bzhi lham pa ste/ /chu klung dag gis rab tu brgyan/ /gang dag gi ni tshe yi tshad/ /chig stong tshang bar brjod pa dang / /sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa yi/ /sems can ya mtshan de na gnas/ /rgya mtsho'i sa ni bskor ba yi/ /ri yi dam pa ri rab la/ /phyogs kyi

lha ni bzhi po rnams/ /kun nas nges par gzhag par bya/ /kAr+ShA pa Na brgyad dag gis/ /dkyil 'khor dang por rdo rje bri/ /de yi gnas rnams de dag tu/ /gser gyi gdu bu dag kyang bya/ /sgo rnams re rer don sgrub pa/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu 'jig rten gsum/ /thub par

nus pa gang yin pa'i/ /sgo srung gnyis kyang gzhag par bya/ /de yang sngags dang ldan bya zhing / /kun tu gzhal yas rgyas par bya/ /rdo rje thog thog lho phyogs bri/ /rdo rje khu tshur byang phyogs gzhag /de nas der ni lha bshos rnams/ /rnam pa sna tshogs bkra ba dang / /

bla med rab mdzes rgyas par bya/ /dri dang me tog phreng bas mchod/ /zhib de'i tha lu sna tshogs pa/ /sbrang rtsis byugs shing gzabs pa dang / /legs byas a shwa ka brti/ /de bzhin be reg nas khur dbul/ /ji tsam du ni rgyas pa phul/ /de tsam du ni 'grub par

bshad/ /'bras kyi 'o thug tshu la ka /thub pa sbyar thug sa mi ta/ /'bras chan tshod ma sna tshogs pa/ /kha dog sna tshogs sor lngar ldan/ /de la sogs pa gang 'dod pa/ /lo ma sna tshogs skyon med pa/ /yang na kham por sar pa'am/ /pad+ma'i lo ma dag la

gzhag /nas dang gro dang mon sran gre'u/ /sA lu dang ni til 'bru rnams/ /snod sar dag gi nang du gzhag /yang na gzhan du de bzhin gzhag /hwags dang kha ras gang ba dang / /btung ba bsil zhing zhim pa dag /snod sar dag gi nang dag tu/ /bzhag nas

rab tu dbul bar bya/ /des na su la'ang 'tshe mi 'gyur/ /dga' ba'i sems kyis za 'dod la/ /kha zas dag kyang sbyin par bya/ /de nas dga' bar bya ba'i phyir/ /ta la'i lo ma bsil yab dbul/ /dri zhim pa yi dri kun gyis/ /dkyil 'khor la ni mchod par bya/ /

spos kyi phye ma sna tshogs pa/ /mchog rnams kyis kyang de bzhin mchod/ /dza ya mu sa na la sogs/ /dri zhim thams cad sbyar bas mchod/ /a ga ru dang du ru ska/ /shing gi thang chu gsar sbyar rnams/ /bdug pa'i rgyur ni bsngags pa yin/ /dngos grub sgo drung 'dug

par bya/ /yang na nang du song nas ni/ /de ni byang phyogs kha blta zhing / /lag na rdo rje tshul bzhin bod/ /shin tu bkra shis tshigs bcad dang / /de bzhin bde legs rdzogs pa gdon/ /de nas der ni rig sngags ma/ /rdo rje lcags kyu rtse mo can/ /rdo rje'i rigs las byung

ba yi/ /rig sngags bstan pa gang yin pa/ /de ni bdag nyid bsrung bar bya/ /de nas thog mar spyan drang ba/ /ri rab de yi rtse mor ni/ /'dug nas sgra chen gdon par bya/ /chos kyi chu klung spyan drang ba/ /dam pa 'di ni brjod par bya/ /bkra shis tshigs bcad brjod pa dang / /

chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / /'dus pa chen po'i mdo dag dang / /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po dang / /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba de/ /ma nyams the tshom med pa dang / /'phags pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu'i/ /seng ge'i sgra ni dpe med gdon/ /de nas rdo rje rigs kyi yum/ /

rig sngags rdo rje lcags kyu bzlas/ /de nas kyang ni rtse mo can/ /de nas rdo rje rigs skyes kyi/ /rig sngags dag ni gang 'dod dang / /snying po 'gro lding gtum po dang / /de yi steng dang 'dod pa yi/ /rdo rje ma dang 'og pa gcan/ /lu gu rgyud dang gtum mo dang / /ser gtum rdo rje

thog thog ma/ /de bzhin rdo rje khu tshur ma/ /rdo rje thub dka' pho nya ma/ /chen mo bcu dang drug cu bzhi/ /dang po blo gros rdo rje ma/ /gnyis pa rdo rje dril bu ma/ /gsum pa rdo rje nag mo dang / /bzhi pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa/ /lnga pa rdo rje rol pa dang / /drug pa yang ni rgod bag can/ /bdun pa rdo rje shugs yin

te/ /brgyad pa rdo rje nyi ma yin/ /dgu pa rdo rje dbyug pa ste/ /de ni sna tshogs gzugs zhes grags/ /bcu pa rdo rje bden pa ste/ /ci dga' bar ni bzlas brjod bya/ /rdo rje dbyug pa blta bar bya/ /rdo rje khro bo 'joms byed dang / /bung ba blta ba chu klung dang / /rdo rje kAt+yA na ya dang / /bdug pas 'jil dang srung ma

dang / /yon tan chen mo de la sogs/ /nges pa nyid du bzlas brjod bya/ /des na dkyil 'khor 'grub par 'gyur/ /nges par gnas pas rig sngags ni/ /mchog 'gyur rdo rje lcags kyu ma/ /bdug pa kun gyis rgyas pa yis/ /dkyil 'khor du ni brgyad brgya bzlas/ /de nas

las su bsgrub pa yis/ /rig sngags des ni grub par 'gyur/ /rig sngags gang la dga' ba des/ /dkyil 'khor du ni bzlas brjod bya/ /lag na rdo rjes bshad pa yi/ /rig sngags mang po de nyid ni/ /mchog 'dod dngos grub 'dod pa yis/ /ci nas skyo bar mi 'gyur spyad/ /

de nas rdzogs par spyan drangs shing / /gsang sngags rgyas par byas nas ni/ /de nas dkyil 'khor 'dod pa kun/ /gzung ba yang ni bshad par bya/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang / /dkon mchog gsum la gtso bor 'dzin/ /dad cing mnyam par gzhag pa yi/ /mi ni

dam tshig 'dzin du gzhug /des na de la mkhas pa yis/ /bslab gzhi lnga ni sbyin par bya/ /ming 'di zhes ni bya ba bdag /phyin cad nam 'tsho'i bar dag tu/ /srog gcod log par g.yem pa dang / /rku dang du smra ba dang / /'bru dang sbyar ba'i chang 'thung ba/ /rtag tu

bdag gi spangs zhes smros/ /bslab gzhi mchog dang ldan pa de/ /blo gros rdo rje bsrung bar bya/ /'bogs par 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir/ /byin gyis rlabs kyi cho ga'ang bya/ /de nas der ni bum pa bdun/ /chu ni rab tu blugs nas kyang / /blo gros rdo rjes bsngags pa des/ /bdud rtsi zhes

ni brjod pa yin/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya ni/ /dril bur bcas pas dran byed brjod/ /lag pa gnyis ka bla 'og sbyar/ /mthe'u chung mthe bo sbrel bya zhing / /bdud rtsi'i chu ni blug par bya/ /gos gtsang bgos shing rab bsdams pa/ /skra bshig pa la ngu 'bod che/ /mi bzad

rnams ni bsgo bar bya/ /'di ni ngu 'bod chen po ste/ /'khrug cing sdug bsngal chen po'i gnas/ /'di yis khyod ni dam tshig las/ /nyams na myur du gdungs par 'gyur/ /khyod ni dam tshig shes gyur na/ /rkyen du bab par ma lus sbyin/ /des na khyod la mkhas pa 'di/ /

'khrug pa'i sdug bsngal byed mi 'gyur/ /dam tshig spangs pa gang yin dang / /dkyil 'khor du ni ma zhugs pa/ /de la dam tshig gzhan med pa/ /bstan bcos kyi ni gzhung lugs yin/ /dmyal ba yod pa 'di la ltos/ /nad rnams thams cad tshogs pa dang / /'byung po la sogs

rnams kyis rgyas/ /khyod ni de nyid ltung bar byed/ /gdon mi za yi sdig pa'i las/ /'di la dpyad par bya ba med/ /rtag tu khyod kyis dam tshig srungs/ /rtag tu dkyil 'khor mchod pa gyis/ /'on kyang 'byung po sha za sogs/ /sdig byed de dag 'jug mi 'gyur/ /slob

dpon la ni gus par bya/ /de ni rdo rje 'dzin nyid yin/ /da ni khyod tshe 'bras bur bcas/ /khyod kyi 'tsho ba 'bras bu yod/ /da ni dam tshig lha rnams dang / /khyod ni mtshungs pa nyid du 'gyur/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal mtshan 'di/ /ji ltar rtag tu mdzes pa bzhin/ /de ltar khyod ni yon tan

gyis/ /dam tshig nges par gnas par 'gyur/ /de nas rdo rje de blangs la/ /lag pa g.yon pas dril bu bzung / /lag pa g.yas pas de yi g.yas/ /bzung nas kyang ni spro bar bya/ /'di skad rtag tu grub pa 'di/ /sdug bsngal dag las sgrol ba ste/ /rdo rje 'dzin chen nyid dang

ni/ /lhan cig tu ni 'jug par 'gyur/ /de nas grur ni zhugs nas kyang / /'khor yug las ni brgal bar bya/ /lag pa btang nas de la ni/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad bstan par bya/ /'khrul pa med par me tog gis/ /mdun bzhugs bde gshegs man chad

dang / /dkyil 'khor gang dang gang mthong ba/ /de dang de la bde bar mchod/ /de nas thams cad mthong nas kyang / /yon gyi bum par dbul bar bya/ /blo can gyis ni mtshan yang bzung / /dam pa gzhan yang bdag gis bshad/ /rdo rje stangs thabs 'gro ba

dang / /gad mo bcas par bsgyur ba dang / /g.yon pas kyang ni brdab par bya/ /seng ge'i sgra sgrogs 'gying ba dang / /mdzub mos hU~M yang bsgrags byas te/ /thams cad shin tu byed pa'i mchog /de nas gzhan yang mi shes pa/ /cho ga bzhin du mnod par bya/ /slob dpon gus

par legs bya zhing / /dam tshigs kyang ni nges par bstan/ /til zan la sogs mon sran gre'u/ /bdag nyid kyis ni legs par bza'/ /lhag par bla mar gus byas dang / /de la dga' bar byas nas ni/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po dang / /rig sngags rnams la sdug par 'gyur/ /

de nas rig sngags tshogs rnams la/ /de yis rig sngags gang 'dod pa/ /de ni bsgrims te bklag bya zhing / /dngos grub 'dod pas rtag tu mchod/ /de ltar slob dpon rgya chen tshogs rnams dang / /lha dang lha min mchog gzugs du ma yis/ /mthong zhing thos la 'brang

bar 'gyur ba dang / /rtag tu legs mchod rjes su bstan pa yin/ rdo rje'i rigs dpal dang ldan pa las mnyes pa dka' zhing me dang nyi ma las lhag pa de kho na nyid kyi mi dang dam pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa mchog tu gyur pa gang dang gang yin pa de dag ni dkyil 'khor dang dam tshig rab tu rtogs

pas rtag tu mthong zhing thos pa'am/ bsgrub pa'i tshul dang ldan par byas na dngos grub 'grub pa'am/ phan pa yang thob par 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje chen po thogs bzhin du rtag tu bdug pa dang / me tog dang / dri dang / lha bshos rgyas par dbul zhing sbyin sreg bya'o/ /de ltar

gnas bzhi pa tshul 'dzin cing nyi ma'i gzi brjid dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor dam pa 'di ni dpal skyed cing mchog tu myur ba'i cho ga yin pas na dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po nyid yin no/ /lag na rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po chen po lag na rdo rje dbang phyug chen po gnyis kyis

dam tshig bshad pa las gnas bzhi pa rdzogs so// //de nas rdo rje lcags kyu ma/ /rdo rje yi ni rigs kyi yum/ /bsgrub pa yi ni don rnams kun/ /sgrub pa byed pa gang yin bshad/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mash+tsaN+Da badzra pA Na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/

na ma ste badzra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni badzrA ya/ na maHsu badzrA ya/ na mo badzra dU ta ye/ na mo badzra shA na ye/ na mo badzra hraM da yA ya/ na mo badzrAM ku shA ya/ na mo badzra ko ShA ya/ na mo badzra pA shA ya/ na mo badzra bi dza yA ya/ na mo badzrAM ku sha ko Sha pA sha bi dza yA ya/ na maHpra brta A brta/

badzraM ku shi/ /mi li mi li/ hi li hi li/ hi ri hi ri/ ki ri ki ri/ AkaD+D+h+ya/ A kaD+D+h+ya/ gi ri gi ri/ khi ri khi ri/ b+hi ri b+hi ri/ ki li ki li/ badzrA ku laM saM sma ra/ gi ri gi ri/ ti ri ti ri/ b+hi ri b+hi ri/ A gats+tsha/ A gats+tsha/ A na ya me hi rat+na/ su bar+Na d+ha na

d+ha n+yaM/ a ta pa ya ma/ pa ru Na ku be ra/ in+d+ra mA kaD+D+h+ya ya/ yan+t+ra dA ma ni/ gr-ih+NAM ku she na/ tat+taM/ ki li ki li/ tsu ru tsu ru/ tsaN+Da tsaN+Di/ ki ri Ni brah+ma na ba de hiM biSh+Nu na ba de hiM kalpi/ ko Na kalpi/ ni li bi la ni lilbi ku mA raM ad+d+ha ru tri ma de hiM tsan+d+raM pa de hiM shuk+k+raM ba de hiM/

sUr+ya ba de hiM/ ya maM ba de hiM/ tat+taM pa de hiM/ tsi ri tsi ri/ pI ri pI ri/ akram+m+yA/ A na la a kram+m+ye/ i hi tu rA hi/ tu ru tu ru/ sarba kA laM su/ di gra bI ri/ ki li ki li/ mi li mi li/ ti ri ti ri/ mi li mi li/ tsa ka tsa ka/ ki ni ki ni/ bi ri bi ri/ sha tha ku shi sa ha sra/ mi la bi sha tsang+ku

shi/ badzraM ba he badzrA Ni pri ye/ ma ti ma ti/ ti ri ti ri/ ki ri ki ri/ akram+m+ya/ a n+ya karmaM ma n+ya/ ba ra ka na ma nA ya/ ya she ya shi na/ /ku ru ku ru/ ki ri ki ri/ g+hi ni g+hi ni/ khi ri khi ri/ bi tsa ra bi tsa ra/ ko shaM ko shi ni/ ku be ra ma kraSh+Ti ka kra ma kad+d+ha/ la la

la la/ ha si ni pri ye/ pri yaM ka ri/ /tsuk+Shurma ti/ /tsuk+ShuHpra bi sha /ma na ma ki ri/ sha ya sne tsan+d+ha ni/ b+hi la b+hi li/ pA sha de ba ra de/ tsak+Shu rde/ ha ra ha ra/ ba su ba su/ mi si mi si/ he he hi hi ha ha/ ki ri ka la ka la/ /ba la ba la/ tsak+ShuHtsak+ShuHte me ka thA

ya sarba sarbe shang+ku ru ku ru/ ba ki me ka ta ya/ mi li mi li/ tsi li tsi li/ tsu lu tsu lu/ pri yaM pri ye na/ sa ra sa ra/ ka ra ka ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ bi ri bi ri/ bi mi ya shaM ya she na/ la b+ha la b+ha/ ki ri ki ri/ mi ti mi ti/ lo ke/ ra ma ra

ma/ ra ti ka ri b+hi ti ka ri/ ma ma su kha ka ri/ nir b+h+ri ti ka ra/ king+ka ri king+ka ri/ ka ra ma ri/ bi ti bi ti/ mi ri mi ri/ tsi ri tsi ri/ hi ri hi ri/ bi ri bi ri/ g+hi ri g+hi ri/ b+hi ri b+hi ri/ hi ri hi ri/ badzri Ni/ badzrAng+ku shi ba ra mAng+ku shi ha re badzre k+ShI pA Ni ka la

shi ba ni/ b+hak+Sha pA Ni/ tsak+Shu rAM ku shi pA Ni/ /b+ha ra b+ha ra/ ma ma pi ri pi ri/ ku ru ku ru/ ki ri ki ri/ tu ru tu ru/ ta ra ta ra/ badzrAM ku shI ye swA hA/ ko ShAng+ku shI ye swA hA/ pA shAng+ku shI ye swA hA/ bi dza yAng+ku shI ye swA hA/ k+She mAng+ku shI ye swA hA/ A dz+nyA yAng+ku shI ye swA hA/

sarbAng+ku sa A kar+Sha NI ye swA hA/ de bAng+ku shI ye swA hA/ s+t+rI pu ru ShAng+ku shI ye swA hA/ hr-i da yAng+ku shI ye swA hA/ d+harmAng+ku shI ye swA hA/ sarba lo ka dza yAng+ku shI ye swA hA/ sarba satwA nA mA kaR+Sha Na ba shI ka ra NAng+ku shI ye swA hA/ rdo rje lcags kyu de nyid ni/ /'di ltar rnam pa gzhan du yang / /

rdo rje rigs chen gtso mo ste/ /'bar ba chen mo mchog sbyin mchog /rigs kyi yum ste rigs kyi mchog /las mchog kun gyi byed pa mo/ /bcing dang bkrol ba thams cad kyi/ /las kun la ni thub med pa/ /dam pa ci 'dra de bzhin 'dra/ /bar ma ci 'dra de bzhin

'gyur/ /snying po dang ni ming 'di yang / /gtso bo dang ni mchog tu bshad/ /lag na rdo rje nyid kyang ni/ /skad cig gis ni 'di bkug na/ /phyi rol rgyal po pho nya sogs/ /tshogs rnams lta la ci zhig smos/ /lha yi rigs ni mthong ba yi/ /rig sngags 'chang ba de

la ni/ /'grub par mi 'gyur gang yang med/ /gang zhig rab tu bsgrims nas ni/ /yum 'di rtag tu 'chang byed pa/ /de la mchog kun 'grub par 'gyur/ bcing ba dang ni grol ba la/ /rig sngags gsang sngags kun bdag 'gyur/ /nang dang phyi rol bcas pa yi/ /

'khor dang ldan par byas na ni/ /gcig pu 'jig rten gsum mchog dang / /rnam pa gsum du 'gyur bar bshad/ /de dag thams cad khyad par du/ /stobs dang ldan par skye bos brjod/ /mdor na yum 'di thams cad kyi/ /mchog gi dam par bshad pa yin/ /

de dag bsgrubs pa'i dus dang ni/ /tha mal dus su rtag tu yang / /ji skad bshad pa de bzhin du/ /rig sngags 'di ni sbyar bar bya/ /na maHtsu ru kun+da/ tsu ru kun+da/ tsu ru ku n+da/ badzra pA Ni/ na mo bud+d+ha s+ya swA hA/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas pa'i

yungs kar gyi phye mas gzhag par bya/ na maHku ru tsu ru badzra pA Ni/ na mo bud+d+ha s+ya swA hA/ 'dis ni me tog dang bdug pa dbul bar bya'o/ /na mo dum+me dum+me/ u dum+me dus+sa dum+me/ tsu ru tsu ru swA hA/ 'dis bshos dbul lo/ /na mo badzrI badzrI/ badzri Ni badzri Ni/ ha na

ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ e taM sarba big+ha nAM bi nA ya kaM/ sa ma mA ra ya/ ha na ha na/ ut+sA da ya/ nA sha ya/ bi d+h+waM sa ya/ sarba duSh+Ta tsit+ta sh+tsa ma me/ hu ru hu ru/ sid+d+ha sh+tsaN+Da badzra pA Ni/ rA dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ me sbar la sngags 'dis shing 'o ma can gyi yam sreg

shing ngam/ ka rim la ka ri'i yam sreg shing dang ske tshe dang / lan tshwa dang tsha ba gsum rnams lhan cig tu sbyar te/ sbyin sreg byas na bgegs dang log 'dren gyi gnod pa thams cad sel bar byed do/ /de nas de yi bsgrub pa ni/ /rig sngags 'chang ba kun gyis mchod/ /

sgrub pa'i thabs ni gang gis su/ /stobs chen 'di ni grub pa bshad/ /thams cad mkhyen pas thams cad gzigs/ /sangs rgyas 'grub byed mgon po dang / /'jig rten dag na ya mtshan gsang / /rdo rje 'dzin la phyag 'tshal nas/ /lha rnams dang ni dri za dang / /rig

sngags 'chang dang lto 'phye che/ /shin tu ya mtshan gsang ba 'di/ /don kun 'grub byed mnyan par gyis/ /gang zhig gsang ba'i rgyal po'i mchog /'di ni so sor 'chang byed pa/ /de la 'jig rten thams cad na/ /bka' las 'gal bar byed pa med/ /ci ste sgrub pa'i

de nyid shes/ /yang na dngos grub 'dod pa yis/ /cho ga bzhin du kun byas na/ /sgrub pa pos ni thams cad 'thob/ /lha 'am lha ma yin rnams dang / /gnod sbyin yang na rig sngags 'chang / /gzhan yang gang dag su yang rung / /'gal

bar byed pa gang yang med/ /sangs rgyas sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po dang / /rig sngags bdag gi bla ma la/ /ci ste mchog tu dang byed na/ /de ni kun las lhag pa dang / /sems can kun gyis mchod pa dang / /rtag tu dngos grub kun byed dang / /gzhan

gyi dngos grub 'jig par nus/ /dus kun du ni gtsang ba dang / /gsang ba thams cad 'chang byed la/ /rig sngags 'chang gi go 'phang mchog /shin tu sems par byed pa yi/ /cho gar ldan zhing rgyas par bcas/ /de ni ma lus bshad par bya/ /de nas lha dang

lha ma yin/ /mi dang rig sngags 'chang rnams dang / /'byung po'i tshogs dang klu rnams dang / /gnod sbyin rnams dang srin por bcas/ /gsang ba'i mchog ni mnyan pa'i phyir/ /thams cad thal mo sbyar nas 'khod/ /de nas tshig don rtogs pa yi/ /rdo rje

'dzin pas de dag la/ /gsal bar bya phyir tshig 'di smras/ /nga ni dkyil 'khor dam pa dang / /bla ma'i rigs ni sngon mthong la/ /rdo rje dang ni rdo rje 'dzin/ /rig sngags sgrub pa rtogs byas nas/ /zla ba phyed gsum bar du ni/ /zla gcig pas ni bsgrub par bya/ /

sangs rgyas gzugs ni rdzogs pa'am/ /sku gdung ldan pa'i mchod rten der/ /rig sngags rdo rje lcags kyu ma/ /rig sngags rigs kyi tshogs bskor ba/ /cho ga bzhin du byas nas ni/ /yid dang 'thad pas mchod par bya/ /mtshams bcad dang ni phyogs bcings dang / /

chus ni kun nas bcad pa dang / /thams cad du ni bsrung ba rnams/ /cho ga bzhin du legs par dgod/ /sna gsum rdo rje bkra shis dang / /lcags kyu kha gdengs yungs kar gyis/ /tshul bzhin dang por mdun dag tu/ /rdo rje lcags kyu'i gzugs su bri/ /kha zas

kyang ni dkar gsum gyis/ /cho ga bzhin byas bza' bar bya/ /dus gsum yang na nub bdun du/ /zlas brjod mchog gi brgyad brgya bya/ /de nas der ni rdo rje dang / /lcags kyu 'bar ba mthong bar 'gyur/ /der ni gzugs las grub pa po/ /lha yi rig sngags

'chang bzhin 'gyur/ /'jig rten gsum yang snang bar byed/ /sa steng dag kyang 'bar ba dang / /'jig rten gsum yang g.yo bar ni/ /bdag nyid kyis ni der mthong 'gyur/ /rig sngags rdo rje lcags kyu dge/ /de nas de la 'grub par 'gyur/ /

kyis bskor gzhon nu ma'i/ /thad de dga' ba rtsen par 'gyur/ /de nas lha dang 'byung po dag /rgya mtsho nam mkha' sa gnas pa/ /dang ba med cing ma grub rnams/ /de ltar dga' bar gyur nas ni/ /don rnams kun yang byed par 'gyur/ /de bzhin du ni ji ltar

yang / /kun tu dngos grub ya mtshan can/ /mkha' la de bzhin byed par 'gyur/ /de nas ci dga' rgyu ba dang / /de yi dga' mgur de bzhin byed/ /rtse dga' mchog tu shes par bya/ /de ni yun du 'tsho bar 'gyur/ /de ni dga' bzhin mkha' la 'gro/ /lha yi

rig sngags 'chang gis bskor/ /de ni gcig pu ci dga' bar/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa yin bzhin du/ /lhag par dga' ba'i gnas rnams su/ /rig sngags 'chang bas bskor bar 'gyur/ /de ni na da ku ber bzhin/ /dga' bar gang yang rtse bar 'gyur/ /dus min par ni

shing rnams dang / /me tog tshal dang 'bras bu'i tshal/ /khang yid du 'ong ba rnams/ /thams cad kyang ni sprul bar byed/ /'on kyang 'di ni mdo tsam ste/ /'dir ni de las bshad mi bya/ /rdo rje lcags kyu grub na ni/ /tshig tu brjod pa thams cad grub/ /las kyi dam pa

'di nyid kyis/ /thams cad kyang ni 'grub par bshad/ /dam tshig tshul bzhin mthong nas ni/ /dam tshig dag la mkhas pa yis/ /gsang rgyas rig sngags rdo rje 'dzin/ /bla ma tshul bzhin mchod par bya/ /bsgrims te mchod pa byas na ni/ /lha bshos dag kyang tshul

bzhin dbul/ /de nas 'dod pa kun sbyin pa/ /rdo rje lcags kyu rig sngags gdon/ /lha bshos de yi cho ga dang / /me tog bdug pas mchod byas nas/ /sgrub pa pos ni ci nus kyis/ /dus gsum bzlas brjod byas na ni/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pas

kyang / /gdon gyis las rnams 'grub par 'gyur/ /des na gdon ni stong phrag rnams/ /dga' mgur yang ni gzhig par nus/ /yang na g.yul ngor mi bzad 'jig /gdon dag gi ni dkyil 'khor du/ /myur du gdon ni 'bebs pa dang / /de bzhin gzhig dang bsad pa dang / /bcing dang

brdeg dang gzir ba dang / /ku co 'don du 'jug yang rung / /grong khyer dang ni gnas rnams dang / /smas pa'i rma ni sbo ba dang / /rig sngags dam pa bshad pa 'dis/ /thams cad kyang ni byed par 'gyur/ /babs pa de dag thams cad kyang / /pi wang dag kyang len du gzhug /de

bzhin gar gyi cho ga rnams/ /yid 'ong ya mtshan byed du gzhug /dgug dang rmi lam cho ga dang / /de bzhin lcags sgrog gzhom pa dang / /rgyal po'i pho brang dag na ni/ /rtsod pa dag las lhag par rgyal/ /gzugs dang stobs chen ldan pa yi/ /rig sngags rdo rje lcags

kyu ma/ /gang gi snying la tshul bzhin rtag /de yi don kun 'grub par 'gyur/ /skyes pa'am yang na bud med dam/ /klu 'am lha yang dga' ba yod/ /der ni kun tu thams cad la/ /don rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /rgyal po dang ni blon po dang / /blon po chen po

mdun na 'don/ /zhag bdun yang na lnga yi bar/ /brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas dbang du 'gyur/ /gang zhig 'chi bar bya 'dod na/ /de yi gzugs de der bris la/ /lag pas mnan la bzlas brjod bya/ /gdon dang klu yi gdon yang rung / /'byung po 'byung po'i gdon dang ni/ /

khar ni rdo rjes gzir byas na/ /zhag bdun gyis ni brlag par 'gyur/ /bran mo dang ni mi rnams kyang / /zhag gsum gyis ni brlag par 'gyur/ /dbang du bya bar 'dod na ni/ /der yang nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas/ /brgyad brgyar bzlas brjod byas na ni/ /bu dang bu mo chung

ma dang / /khyim thab dang ni nor 'jog dang / /khyim dang bzhon pa glang chen rta/ /ma he dang ni grong yang rung / /zhag bdun gyis ni myur bar 'thob/ /gzhan gyis rig sngags rigs kun dang / /gdon rnams kyang ni brlag par 'gyur/ /khye'u dag dang ni bu mo rnams/ /

nad kyis kyang ni ma rung 'gyur/ /ro bsregs sol ba'i ri mo yis/ /dgra yi gzugs ni der bris la/ /de yi steng du 'dug nas ni/ /gang du gzhom par 'dod pa der/ /gzir bar byas te zhag bdun du/ /bzlas brjod dang ni sbyin sreg bya/ /de ltar byas na gzir bar

'gyur/ /ci ste bu mo thob 'dod na/ /des ni zhag bdun bya bar bstan/ /zhag bdun 'bum du bzlas na ni/ /bu mo'i mchog kyang thob par 'gyur/ /rig sngags 'chang ba bdag nyid kyis/ /khros nas bzlas brjod byas na ni/ /grong khyer dag ni 'bar ba dang / /gser

dang de bzhin 'jig pa dang / /gdon dag gis ni 'debs par 'gyur/ /gang las rgyal 'dod dmag gi nang / /'dug nas kyang ni bzlas brjod bya/ /grong khyer dbus 'dug bzlas na ni/ /nad kyis grong khyer dkrugs par 'gyur/ /grong gi dbus 'dug bzlas na ni/ /grong

mi nad kyis dkrugs par 'gyur/ /dgon par 'dug nas bzlas na ni/ /gdug pa kun las thar bar 'gyur/ /de nas yid ni zhi ba yis/ /zhi ba'i rig sngags brjod par bya/ /zhi phyir rig sngags brjod na ni/ /thams cad du ni zhi bar 'gyur/ /bsad phyir rig sngags

bzlas na ni/ /phan tshun du yang gsod par 'gyur/ /'thab tu gzud phyir rig sngags bzlas/ /'thab mo mngon du 'byung bar 'gyur/ /shing skam phyir ni chu la bzlas/ /zla ba gcig gis lo ma 'byung / /kun dga' ra ba yid 'ong yang / /zla ba gcig gis bshig par

'gyur/ /ci ste nyi ma rangs par bzlas/ /chu dang zas dang bag chos dang / /'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs kyang / /de ma thag tu sgyur bar byed/ /gzhan gyis bzhon dang de bzhin du/ /shing rta'i bzhon pa 'joms par byed/ /ci ste chu klung chen po yi/ /'gram du song

nas bzlas brjod byas/ /las rnams gang dang gang 'dod dang / /gang gang cho ga ji bzhin gang / /de bzhin cho ga gtor ma dang / /bzlas brjod sbyin sreg gtsang byas na/ /des na don rnams thams cad kyang / /byed 'gyur de la the tshom med/ /rtag tu bden smra bslab

la dga'/ /dngos grub mchog chen thams cad ldan/ /'byung po sgrub par 'dod na ni/ /zhag gsum smyung byas mar gyi ngo / /bcu bzhi la ni gtor ma sbyin/ /zla ba drug gam zla ba phyed/ /shing drung yang na dgon par gnas/ /gcig pu bsrung ba mchog byas la/ /slong mo yi ni

zas kyang bza'/ /zla drug yang na zla ba gcig /lha 'am gdon kyang gnas kyang rung / /zla gcig phyugs kyi lhas su gnas/ /zho dang 'o ma mar yang bza'/ /sku gdung ldan pa'i mchod rten drung / /zla gcig sna tshogs zas kyis mchod/ /zla ba gnyis ni dur khrod du/ /gtor ma

bdug pa gtsang sogs mchod/ /thang ngam mchod rten drung du bzlas/ /de nas 'byung po brlag par 'gyur/ /der ni 'byung po dam pa gang / /yang na thog mar gang 'ongs dang / /gang tshe de la nye bar 'gyur/ /gang na gang zhig sems kyis 'dod/ /de tshe shin tu bsnyen nas ni/ /

rdo rje lcags kyu rtag tu bzlas/ /de yi ming ni dris nas kyang / /de nyid ming ni gzung bar bya/ /gcig pus dkyil 'khor byas na ni/ /rig sngags rdo rje lcags kyu'i tshogs/ /dri la sogs pas legs mchod nas/ /des ni 'byung po de dag dgug /de yis ming brjod 'byung po

rnams/ /dga' nas der ni 'ong bar 'gyur/ /de nas des ni legs par mchod/ /gzhan yang 'ongs nas mchod par bya/ /ming ni legs par brjod bya zhing / /skrag byed ming la brten nas ni/ /'byung po sgrub tu grub 'gyur na/ /mi ni 'grub par 'gyur ba yin/ /de nas de la 'byung po

rnams/ /kun nas nye bar 'khor bar 'gyur/ /rgyal po'i zham ring mthun byed bzhin/ /las kun yang ni byed par 'gyur/ /de ni rgyal po'i dmag rnams la/ /rgyal po chen pos byas pa bzhin/ /stobs chen 'byung po'i sde dag la/ /bka' ni kun tu stsol bar byed/ /sa stengs kun tu

rtse byed cing / /'byung po'i bdag po kun gyis mchod/ /'byung po dag gis phul ba yi/ /kha zas la sogs thams cad za/ /grong ni gang la rgyal 'dod cing / /yang na phan par 'dod kyang rung / /bsgrub phyir yang ni gzhig pa'i phyir/ /der ni 'byung po rnams kyang gtong / /des ni ming

gang ma bkug pa'i/ /'byung po'am 'byung po'i tshogs kyang rung / /de yi las mchog 'dod na ni/ /de yi ming yang smos par bya/ /ming ni smos pa de yis ni/ /snyems pa med pa'i 'byung po yang / /bkug pa med par myur du ni/ /bka' bzhin byed par 'gyur ba bstan/ /de ni mi yi

'khor dag tu/ /sgyu 'phrul du ma byed par 'gyur/ /lhag par 'byung po'i 'khor dag tu/ /spyod pa sna tshogs byed par 'gyur/ /srog chags mi la sogs rnams kyi/ /srog la dbang bar des 'gyur ro/ /'byor bar bya ba'i phyir yang rung / /yang na lus ni gzhig phyir des/ /ming gis

bkug pa'i 'byung po la/ /dga' bzhin bag brkyang smra bar bya/ /ming la sogs pa 'di dag gis/ /sna ni shin tu che ba dang / /shin tu ring bar byos shig ces/ /bsgo na de bzhin byed par 'gyur/ /de bzhin rkang lag bzhin mdog bsgyur/ /rid pa dang ni skam pa dang / /ma rung bar

ni byos shig ces/ /bsgo na de tshe de bzhin byed/ /de bzhin rnam pa mang po dang / /shin tu 'jigs pa sna tshogs ston/ /de bzhin zhi byed sna tshogs kyis/ /'byung po sgrub pa rtse bar 'gyur/ /mi 'dod na yang mi rnams dang / /'byung po mang pos mthong mi 'gyur/ /rig sngags 'chang

chen bzhin du 'gyur/ /gang zhig rig sngags rtag tu zlos/ /lha la yang ni phyag 'tshal zhing / /rtag tu 'byung po rnams la yang / /kha zas ci 'dod sbyin byed por/ /de ni lhag par bde 'gyur zhing / /tshe yang lhag par bskal par thub/ /'byung po mang po'i rgyal po mchog /gtso bor

yang ni 'gyur ba dang / /lha yi rgyal po 'dra ba yang / /rkyen du bab par bshad pa yin/ /rdo rje lcags kyu ma yi bsgrub pa rdzogs so// //rdo rje lcags kyu'i rig la ni/ /rig sngags don kun grub byed pa/ /lha mo mchog 'gror grags pa 'di/ /sems can rnams

kyis bsten par bshad/ /zla ba drug gis 'grub 'gyur te/ /tshig gis don kun byed par bstan/ /rtsi sman thams cad blangs nas ni/ /srang gcig nges par gzhag par bya/ /na mo rat+na tra ya s+ya/ na mo badzra pA Ni s+ya/ ba ti ba ra ti/ ku sha

sa m+ban+na ma na se/ a ta ra te/ ba te/ ye saM tse b+hU te/ at+te the/ rU pi ta a smr-i mi swA hA/ sku gdung ldan pa'i mchod rten drung / /dus gsum bzlas brjod brgyad brgya bya/ /gtsang zhing tshangs par spyod pa yis/ /lha bshos me tog bdug pa dang / /de bzhin mtshan

mo mar me dang / /mchod pa ci nus ci dga' bya/ /mtshams bcad phyogs bcing bsrung ba rnams/ /rtag tu rdo rje lcags kyus bya/ /de ltar rtag tu brtson pa la/ /de ni zla ba drug gis 'grub/ /de nas 'dod chags la sogs dang / /sman chen mnyam par

'jog par 'gyur/ /nad dang sman kun ston pa dang / /gtam rgyud thams cad smra bar 'gyur/ /sgrub pa po la legs nyes rnams/ /tshig gis ston cing smra bar byed/ /gsang sngags de'i cho ga ni 'di yin te/ ras ma nyams pa la tshon rtsi sbyin med pas bcom ldan

'das dang lag na rdo rje'i sku gzugs bris te/ /lha mo yang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la 'dud par byas nas/ yar gyi ngo tshes gcig la brtsams te/ zas su 'o ma dang phye'i lde gu za zhing dus gsum du sna ma'i me tog brgyad brgya la lan re re bzlas brjod byas pas lag na

rdo rje la bsnun par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das dang lag na rdo rje la mchod pa yang rtag tu byas te/ mjug tu zhag gsum smyung bar byas nas/ zla ba nya'i nub mo brgyad stong gis bsnun la ci 'byor pas mchod na 'grub par 'gyur te/ don thams cad ston par byed do/ /gzhan

yang tshes bcu gnyis nas brtsams te/ nya'i bar du gtsang zhing nges pa dang ldan par byas te/ ras la bcom ldan 'das dang / lag na rdo rje dang / lha mo dang / sgrub pa po rnams dge bsnyen la 'drir bcug ste/ sku gdung dang ldan pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du bcom ldan

'das kyi spyan sngar mchod pa byas nas/ sna ma'i me tog brgyad brgya la lan brgyad brgya sngags kyis btab nas phung po lngar bcad de/ de rnams las cha gcig bcom ldan 'das la dbul bar bya'o/ /lhag ma rnams ni phyogs bzhir gtor bar bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la

phul ba de dag las kha cig blangs te ras dkar po'i nang du phur nas sngas su bcug ste nyal bar bya'o/ /'o ma dang phye'i 'de gu dang zas dkar po za zhing me tog dkar po dang / dri dkar po phul na zla ba nya la 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas gang gi nyin par yang rung ste/ cho ga de bzhin du

sna ma'i me tog brgyad brgya la lan brgyad brgya bzlas brjod byas te/ mchod pa byas la lhag ma yang de bzhin du gtor nas nyal na rmi lam du thams cad ston par byed do/ /cho ga gsum pa ni me long la bsgrub par bya'o/ /mchog 'gro ma'i rig sngags kyi cho ga rdzogs so// //

na mo rat+na tra ya s+ya/ na mash+tsaN+Da badzra pA Ni s+ya/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ti s+ya/ e h+ye hi badzra pA Ni/ i daM bA ha na/ ma nu sma ra shI g+h+raM ma na tsa ba la li ta ga ti/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ti badzra pA Ni/ hi hi he hi he hi hi hi/ he ku ru he ku ru/ ku ku ku ku/ ku badzra pA Ni/ sa ra sa ra/

bai ri bai ri/ he hi he hi he hi/ ku ku b+ha ku ku b+ha/ badzra pA Ni swA hA/ 'di ni snying po spyan drang pa'o/ /de la 'di ni lag na rdo rje'i snying po yin no/ /sarba tra a pa rA dzi taM/ sarba tra a pra ti ha taM/ sarba tra ar+tha sA d+ha naM/ o~M dza ste dzo grA ma NaM/ swa rU pa mu pa dar+ShA N+RaM/ kI li

kI li/ mo ku sa shap+dA ru taM badzro t+yA t+t+wa ka ra ka ra kr-i t+yu ka ra na ra Na dza naM/ ad+d+ha na sid+d+haM pa ra ma sid+d+haM/ pa tsa laM tsaN+DaM pi tra/ pa kaM sa kaM ra ka ta ka raM shAM ti ka raM/ puSh+Ti ka raM/ swa pa no pa ra dar+ShaM/ tsa ra dan/ sarba karma ar+tha sA d+ha kaM/ A kar+ShA NAM/ badzra bA Ni s+ya/ bo la lA pa naM/ badzra pA Ni

s+ya/ ha sa pA naM/ badzra pA Ni s+ya/ pa ra ma hr-i da ya mi daM na/ badzra pA Ni s+ya/ badzra pA Ni ra ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ti rA dz+nyA pa ya ti badzre Na/ ha na ti/ da ha ti/ pa tsa ti/ ts+tshin+da ti/ ts+tshin+da ti/ bid drA pa ya ti/ A lo ka bi lo kaM ka ro ti/ hi li ni/ li mi li/ o u ho u ho u b+ha badzra pA Ni/ hu ru

hu ru/ saM g+haM badzra b+hany+dza ye duSh+TAM/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ ba sh+yaM ka ro hi ha la ha lA ya swA hA/ hu lu hu lA ya swA hA/ hi li hi lA ya swA hA/ ka la ka lA ya swA hA/ ku lu ku lA ya swA hA/ kI li kI lA ya swA hA/ ki li ki lA ya swA hA/ da ya ma

na sma ra badzra pA Ni/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ti sa ma ya pra ti gr-ih+Na hu te hu ti d+huM pa pa pA sha pa gan+d+ha ma l+yaM tsa ra swa ma dU twa swa ma yaM b+h+ya ti kra ma mAd ma/ sa ma yo bi ti shu ti/ hi li hi ri na i li/ ku ru kaM du pra sa de shak+to smin du ru me ha ra ba rA hi ri li/ ni ri li/ badzra pA Ni/ ti li ti li/

ba shi ma nu brta hi ri Ni/ ni ri Ni badzra pA Ni sa ma yA nu brta hi ri mi'i i b+ha ha ya ni/ sa twaM badzra pA Ni ma ma hi/ swa ya mu pa tiSh+Tha swA hA/ 'di ni de'i bdug pa'i sngags so/ /li hi li hi bi li tu u b+h+yo/ u b+ha/ hu ru hu/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ ba sh+ye ka ro haM daM swA hA/ lag na

rdo rje phyag 'tshal bcas/ /rtsed mo can zhes bya ba yi/ /snying po 'di ni 'jig rten grags/ /de na 'dod dgur bsgrub pa yin/ /gang zhig dngos grub mchog 'dod cing / /'di yi bsgrub pa'i don shes pa/ /des ni rdo rje bsgrub pa'i mchog /ya mtshan 'di ni

bsgrub par bya/ /de nas rim pa ji bzhin du/ /bdag gis legs par bshad par bya/ /dam pa'i don gyi rjes mthun pa/ /thub la spyi bos phyag 'tshal ba/ /gser ram ra gan zangs la sogs/ /yang na tsan+dan dmar po las/ /rdo rje rtse mo brgyad pa'am/ /

yang na rtse mo bzhi bar bya/ /sor gsum yang na drug gam brgyad/ /yang na sor ni bcu gnyis pa/ /zur brgyad shin tu rdzogs pa'am/ /yang na zur ni drug tu bya/ /de nas dgon pa'am rang gi khyim/ /gtsang zhing mnyam pa'i sa phyogs su/ /ba lang lci bas

dkyil 'khor byugs/ /sku gdung mchog dga' gtsang ma yis/ /de yi steng du dri zhim pa'i/ /spos kyis dkyil 'khor byug par bya/ /yungs kar phul thag bzhi rnams kyang / /dbus dag tu ni gzhag par bya/ /de yi steng du rdo rje de/ /dri dang me tog phreng

bas brgyan/ /rtag tu yang ni dus gsum du/ /mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs bya/ /tsam pa ka dang tsam pa ka'i/ /me tog sna ma'i me tog rnams/ /yid du 'ong bas sangs rgyas dang / /rdo rje 'dzin la nges par mchod/ /du ru ska dang a ga ru/ /bdug pa'i

mchog ni rtag tu bsreg /sku gzugs cho ga bzhin bris la/ /cho ga 'di ni bya ba ste/ /sangs rgyas gser gyi kha dog 'dra/ /sangs rgyas thad na gnas pa yi/ /lag na rdo rje g.yon phyogs bri/ /rgyal po bzhin du brgyan bya zhing / /ha cang dmar bar mi bya ste/ /sku

gzugs nub phyogs logs su bstan/ /shes rab can gyis cho ga 'di/ /bya ste de ni rim bzhin bshad/ /dang po yang ni tshes gcig brtsams/ /nges par gnas shing gtsang ba yis/ /khrus ni ba lang lci ba dang / /ba gcin btsags pas dus gsum bya/ /

mdun du rtag tu gos phrugs ni/ /bdug pas rab tu bdugs pa bgo/ /tsam pa ka dang tsam ka yi/ /me tog rnams kyis rtag tu mchod/ /sna tshogs dri dang me tog phreng / /mdzes shing yid du 'ong bas mchod/ /lan grangs brgyad brgyar bzlas brjod bya/ /du

ru ska dang a ga ru/ /bsreg cing mar me gnyis kyang dbul/ /rtag tu 'chi bar mi bya ste/ /de bzhin mar gyi mar me gzhan/ /nyin gcig bzhin du bskyed par bya/ /de tshe 'o ma'i 'dag gu rnams/ /za zhing mnyam par gzhag pa dang / /gso sbyong yan lag brgyad

ldan pas/ /tshes ni bcu gnyis bar du yang / /rtag tu ku sha'i mal stan 'dug /de nas zhag gsum smyung byas nas/ /zla ba nya la cho ga bzhin/ /dpe med pa yi mchod pa bya/ /der ni tshon rtsi sna gsum gyis/ /grong khyer dag kyang bri bar bya/ /gru bzhi lham pa

slo bzhir ldan/ /phyogs cha legs par gcad bya zhing / /mnyam byas de yi nang dag tu/ /lha bshos dkar po dpe med dbul/ /phyi rol du yang sna tshogs pa/ /ci 'dod thams cad gzhag par bya/ /de nas ku sha'i stan 'dug cing / /bsrung byas cho ga shes

pa des/ /rdo rje 'bar bar gyur gyi bar/ /a ka ru dang du ru ska/ /bsreg cing dga' bzhin bzlas brjod bya/ /nyi ma las lhag de yi gzi/ /rdo rje de ni legs par blangs/ /cis kyang mi 'jigs mkha' la 'gro/ /rig sngags grub pa'i

stobs dang ldan/ /rig sngags bdag po thams cad dang / /lag na rdo rje rigs skyes pa'i/ /rig sngags tshogs ni kun gyis mchod/ /don mang dag la brten bya zhing / /rnam pa mang du ci zhig smos/ /lag na rdo rje mnyam 'gyur te/ /'di la the tshom ci yang med/ /

de nas dga' ba ma yin pa'i/ /las de dag kyang 'dir bya ste/ /de dag gi ni mdor bstan pa/ /snying po bsdus pa bshad par bya/ /gang zhig mi yi gtso bo'am/ /blon po dbang du bya 'dod des/ /de yi bsgrub pa gang yin pa/ /'di yang rab tu bshad par bya/ /zhag

bdun gtsang mar byas nas ni/ /nas kyi zas ni dus su bza'/ /de nas seng ldeng me bsangs la/ /yam sreg shing dang sbrang rtsi zho/ /mar blangs brgyad brgya tshang bar ni/ /dus gsum du yang sbyin sreg bya/ /dus kyi lhag ma rtag tu bzlas/ /lan gsum khrus byas nges

par gnas/ /dbang du bya 'dod gang yin pa/ /de dang yang ni phrad par bya/ /de yi ming ni smos pas kyang / /de ni bran bzhin dbang du 'gyur/ /mi ni gang zhig bran nor 'dod/ /des ni nor gyi tshad bsams la/ /de yi bsgrub mchog 'di bya zhing / /lan gsum

khrus byas bil ba yi/ /bdug pa mar dang ldan pa bsreg /de nas lag na rdo rje'i mdun/ /der ni ba lang lci ba'i mer/ /sngar bshad pa ni gang yin pa'i/ /sbyin sreg mnyam par gzhag par bya/ /yang na bil ba'i sbyin sreg ni/ /mar dang yungs kar ldan pa'am/ /

yungs kar mar dang ldan pa'ang rung / /yang na mar ldan bil ba'am/ /mar dang yungs kar ldan pa yi/ /sbrang rtsi bzang po bil bar ldan/ /yang na re re sbyin sreg mchog /brgya rtsa brgyad du bya ba ste/ /seng ldeng yam sreg shing bzang gis/ /dus gsum du ni rnam

gsum byas/ /phye dang ba gcin 'de gu dang / /phye dang 'o ma'i 'de gu'ang rung / /dus gsum bza' zhing yang na ni/ /mi smra mi bza' rig sngags bzlas/ /yang na sbyin sreg yid kyis bya/ /gtsang zhing brtson par gnas pa des/ /nor ni yid la gang 'dod pa/ /zhag

bdun gyis ni thob par 'gyur/ /zla phyed yang na zla ba gcig /yang na zla ba phyed gsum gyis/ /rnam pa kun gyi thabs rnams kyi/ /'dod pa thams cad ma lus sbyin/ /yang na gdon gyi las rnams 'dir/ /sbyin sreg bzlas brjod brtson pa dang / /gtsang zhing dam tshig

mkhas pa yis/ /thams cad rab tu 'grub par 'gyur/ /rtsed mo can gyi snying po rdzogs so// //de nas gtum po'i snying po'i cho ga rgyas par bshad par bya'o/ /na maHtsi li/ /tsi ri ni/ i li ku ru hat+ti pra sid+d+ha b+hak+to smi ku ru me ha ba raM ki li bi li/ hi ri Ni su ru

ku ru/ sa ma ya ma nu brta hr-i da yaM swA hA/ snying po dran par byed pa'i tshig 'di dag gang du brjod pa der dga' bar gyur nas las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /na maHkI li kI lA ya swA hA/ ma hA kI li kI lA ya swA hA/ kro d+ha kI li kI lA ya swA hA/ tsaN+Da kI li kI lA ya swA hA/ de ba

ti kI li kI lA ya swA hA/ badzra kI li kI lA ya swA hA/ badzra d+ha rA ya swA hA/ badzra mo ta nA ya swA hA/ badzra stam+b+ha nA ya swA hA/ badzra pra b+han+d+ha nA ya swA hA/ e hi sti badzra/ e hi su sti badzra/ e hi pra ti pra ti ra badzra/ e hi a pra ti ha ta badzra/ e hi a mo

g+ha badzra/ e hi shI g+h+raM nI la be ga badzra/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ti/ badzra pA Ni/ mu ne mu ne mu ne/ ri ma ti/ me hA ma ti/ su ma ti/ e hi pa ni ti li/ sau haM di li pir+t+wa ma ti to ni ra ti ra ti ti/ ku la ti li shi li/ tsa ra di mo ti/ ku tsit+tha marte/ su bu ru bu ru/ khu khu ti/ khu khu ti/

khud li ti li ti ri/ e hi shI g+h+raM badzra pA Ni/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ti/ i daM g+han+d+ha mA le/ a nu le pa na maH/ pra tIts+tsha ku di ku di ku ti swA hA/ /ku di bi ri bi ri ti swA hA/ bi ti maM ku ti la swA hA/ a ra li sa ra shi li tsa ra li sa ra li gi ri ni/ barma li ni si li ti/ pur+Na kur+Na/ sharba durba karba turba

kut+ta/ mut+ta narba parba/ balba ram+ba ha hwa/ e hi e hi/ shI g+h+raM badzra pA Ni/ he he hai hai/ tu ru tu ru la hU~M la hU~M swA hA/ sma ra taM nA ga ri yat+t+ra/ pra ti dz+nyA kr-i ta/ mi ti ri ti/ di ri ri ti li pu swA hA/ ku khu lu tu ti lu ti li ri swA hA/ e hi tri ma hA yak+Sha se nA

pa ti hi ri/ ti ri b+hi ti/ ri li gi ni/ ni ra jan+tu/ bi ri dza yan+tu/ ri kan+ti rang+ga/ tsu ru tsu ru/ tsi ri ti ri swA hA/ narba sharba ba ku ku lu/ khu khu lu/ khu khu ti ni/ ru ru ta ru/ smra ra taM/ pra ti dz+nyAM swA hA/ lag na rdo rje gtum rab gtum/ /nga yi snying po gnyis pa ni/ /

gtum zhing rab gtum las yin te/ /ming yang gtum po zhes par grags/ /gtum po rdo rje 'dzin pa yi/ /snying po gtum po 'di dag ni/ /gnyis pa zhes ni bya bar bstan/ /las rnams la ni zla phyed de/ /dam pa rnams kyi las kun mchog /gdon la sogs dang sems

can kun/ /'gugs pa'i mchog la sogs pa dang / /bsrung ba la sogs dpe med pa/ /'di yi las ni stong rnams dang / /cho ga chen po brgyad rnams kyang / /lha gnas mthong bar nges par ni/ /bzlas brjod sbyin sreg rnams kyis bya/ /la la gang zhig rdo rje 'dzin/ /mngon

sum mthong bar 'dod na ni/ nga yi sgrub pa'i thabs 'di dag /spyan 'dren mchog 'di de yis bya/ /dus gsum ba lang li bas bskus/ /las kyang dag cing sems dag dang / /rdo rje 'dzin la gus pa dang / /rkang lag la sogs bkrus nas kyang / /dgon pa'am rang gi khyim yang

rung / /gtsang ma'i phyogs su mchod rten nam/ /sku gzugs yang na sku gdung gi/ /mdun du rtag tu mnyam par gzhag /mi ni gtsang sbrar spyod pa yis/ /bdug pa me tog la sogs pa/ /mchog dang khyad par 'phags pa yis/ /dus gsum rtag tu mchod par bya/ /de

la rab spro de la gus/ /srog kyang de la bstan byas nas/ /lag na rdo rje gzugs kyang rung / /ji skad bstan bzhin ri mor bri/ /dri dang phreng ba byug pa yis/ /rtag tu de la mchod par bya/ /mar dang ldan pas dus su bza'/ /sbrang rtsi 'o thug bza' bar bya/ /ri mo'i sku gzubs nub

phyogs bstan/ /rtag tu shar phyogs kha blta 'dug /mar gyi mar me mi 'chi bas/ /nyin par mchod pa legs par bya/ /cho 'phrul gyi ni zla phyed dam/ /yar gyi ngo yi tshes brgyad la/ /brtsams te brgyad stong bzlas brjod bya/ /yang na nyin re dus gsum du/ /lan grangs brgyad

brgyar bzlas brjod bya/ /thang chu yang ni bsreg par bya/ /dang zhing rtse gcig sems kyis ni/ /bsrung ba'i mchog byas bzlas brjod bya/ /zla ba phyed ni lon nas kyang / /des ni zhag gsum smyung bar bya/ /mchod pa la sogs kun rgyas shing / /shin tu mang por byas nas kyang / /'dod

pa yid la gzhag bya zhing / /de nas gus pa mchog gis su/ /o~M ni tshig stong bzlas brjod byas/ /de nas rdo rje can yang mthong / /de la mchog sbyin gtso bo de/ /dam pa'i mchog ni sbyin par byed/ /bsgrub pa'i cho gas spyan drangs nas/ /mchod sbyin mchog la ci 'dod smros/ /tshig

gis gang dag gang brjod pa'i/ /bsgrub pa'i dam pa thob par 'gyur/ /de yi slar btang cho ga de/ /rnam pa thams cad bshad par bya/ /des ni phyag dang mchod pa dang / /mchod yon me tog la sogs dbul/ /'dod pa'i rig sngags lan cig brjod/ /des ni rdo rje 'dzin par 'gro/ /

na maHhi li hu la/ ni li hu la/ a ha ha ha ha ha sa/ bri ti gats+tsha/ tu b+ha ga bAM/ badzra pA Ni re tha su khaM tsu lu tsu lu swA hA/ /'di ni gcig gam gsum du brjod/ /lnga 'am bdun nam nyi shu gcig /brgya'am yang na brgyad brgya 'am/ lan stong cho ga bzhin du brjod/ /'byung po'i

gnas sam gzhan dag tu/ /rdo rje dang ni lha yi mdun/ /dri kun gyi ni sbyor ba dang / /bcing dang grol la bzlas brjod bya/ dgug dang slar btang thams cad dang / bcing dang grol ba thams cad la/ der ni lan cig brjod par bya/ /des na rdo rje 'dzin par 'gro/ /'di ni rtsed

mo ldan pa yi/ /bsgrub dang slar btang ba yang yin/ /'di gnyis la ni khyad par du/ /dbye bar bya ba mang po yod/ /gang gis rtag tu gtsang byas la/ /lo gcig bar du dus gsum du/ /bzlas brjod rnam pa gsum byas na/ /de yis bde bar 'dod pa 'thob/ /gang

zhig zla drug sgrub byed cing / /bzlas brjod nyi shu rtsa gcig byed/ /legs byas de ni mkha' la rgyu/ /'bring dang lhag ma nyid du 'gyur/ /gang zhig zla gsum bzlas brjod byed/ /yang na yid kyis sbyin sreg las/ /byas na cho ga 'di dag gis/ /de ltar de yang

'grub par 'gyur/ /zla ba phyed gsum za gcig zos/ /des kyang dngos grub tha ma 'am/ /'bring dang khyad par 'phags pa thob/ /khyim gyi don rnams grub byed cing / /nad rnams kyang ni sel bar byed/ /don rnams ji skad bshad pa bzhin/ /de dag thams cad rab tu 'grub/ /

zla ba gcig tu bzlas brjod byed/ /'o thug sbrang rtsi mar bcas bza'/ /dus gsum brgyad brgya bzlas pas ni/ /gsum brjod mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur/ /legs par ma byas gdon la sogs/ /don rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /bcing dang grol ba thams

cad dam/ /bsgrub pa'am gzhig pa bcang bar byed/ /zla phyed nas kyi kha zas zos/ /gdon gyi las rnams byed par nus/ /ba gcin nas kyi kha zas zos/ /don rnams thams cad 'grub par nus/ /zhag bdun du ni dus gsum du/ /de bzhin brgyad brgya bzlas

brjod byas/ /dbang du bya dang bcings la sogs/ /bsad par yang ni nus par 'gyur/ /gang zhig zhag lngar zas mi za/ /nyin gcig bzhin du bzlas brjod byed/ /des na mo rnams gzhig pa'am/ /dgrol dang dbang du bya bar nus/ /zhag gsum bar du dus gsum du/ /

gang zhig sbyin sreg rnam gsum byed/ /lhag ma'i dus su khros nas bzlas/ /des ni gzhan yang gzhig par nus/ /drag po yi ni las byed na/ /zhag gcig smyung byas dur khrod du/ /khrag gi sbyin sreg byas na ni/ /nges ni gdon dang mi rnams gzhig /de dag bsgrub par

bya ba'i phyir/ /dang por zhag gsum smyung byas nas/ /mar gyi ngo ni bcu bzhi la/ /sum brgya lnga bcu gtsang mas bzlas/ /sngar bstan 'di dag byas na ni/ /de nas nges par gnyis kas kyang / /tshig gis gang dang gang smras pa/ /bsam pa'i las ni byed par 'gyur/ /

de ltar rtsed mo ldan pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor snying po mchog kyang bshad/ /'gro lding snying po gsum po yang / /cho ga dag dang bcas par ni/ /las kyi dam pa thams cad dang / /de bzhin 'bring dang tha ma la/ /rdo rje rdzogs par khru gang srid/ /rtse gsum yongs su dag pa'i

mchog /yang na rtse drug dam pa ni/ /de kun gyis ni bri bar bya/ /gus mchod rdo rje rig sngags kyis/ /rdo rje de ni spyan yang drang / /me tog dam pa mnyams pa/ /lag pa g.yon thogs legs par mchod/ /lag na bdug thogs pus mo btsugs/ /des na rig sngags

'di yang bzlas/ /na mo reM reM grAM grAM/ tsi ri Ti bi NAM/ tra pa ru Ni/ badzrA ma ya/ tu pi ta ye badzra pA Ni/ ma hA ba hA ya swA hA/ bris pa de ni lag g.yon thogs/ /mchod gnas kyang ni mchod par bya/ /bya ba zin nas slar gtang phyir/ /mchod nas slar ni gtang bar bya/ /

gtum po dang rtsed mo can gyis bsgrub par rdzogs so// //'gro lding gi snying po bshad par bya ste/ /gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa'o/ /de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde'i bdag po lag na rdo rje bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste/ /bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas dul

ba mchog gis gnas shing bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas mgo bo btud cing thal mo rab tu sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / /skye bo mang po

la bde ba'i slad du bdag nyid kyi snying po 'jig rten dag la bshad la gsol/ /bdag gi snying po ni 'di lags te bcom ldan 'das gang gis bdag nyid kyi snying po 'dis bdag bkug na de'i thad du bdag myur du mchi bar 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das ci ste bdag nyid kyi snying

po 'dis bdag bkug pa las ma mchis na 'jig rten pa la la dgra bcom pa gsod pa'am/ /dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyid pa gang lags pa de dag gi skye gnas su mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das de bas na zhag gcig smyung bar bgyis pas bdag bkug na de las bcom ldan 'das

kyis slar gtang bar gsol/ /de skad ces gsol nas bcom ldan 'das yid tsam 'dzum pa mdzad de lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /lag na rdo rje legs so legs so/ /khyod kyis 'jig rten dag la khas blangs pas khyod la nga mnyes kyis gnod sbyin gyi

sde'i bdag po lag na rdo rje khyod song la dad pa dang ldan pa yi chad par ma byed cig /de lta mod kyi nga yang khyod kyi snying po nyan par ni 'dod do/ /de skad ces bka' stsal nas gnod sbyin gyi sde'i bdag po chen po lag na rdo rjes gdong cung zad tsam phab nas 'dzem bzhin du bcom ldan 'das la

'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag la gsan du gsol/ tad+ya thA/ e hi s+thi ra badzra/ e hi su s+thi ra badzra/ e hi ma tu badzra/ a pra ti ha ta badzra/ i hi i ma ka badzra/ e hi shI g+h+raM nI la be ga badzra be ga badzra/ ma hA badzra/ badzra pA Ni ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ti mu ne mu ne/ a nai ri ma ti ma ti a nai ri ma ti ma hA

la ti su ma ti e rin+ti li/ d+hu ri ti me de pu li ri ti/ dzi ri ti ku la ti shi li shi ba li ti ma ti pu tshot+ta marta tsit+ta tsit+ta marte/ du ru du ru/ khu khu ti khu khu ti ha la ti la/ ti ri e hi shI g+h+raM badzra pA Ni i daM gaM d+ha mA le nu le pa naM/ pra tIts+tsha/ ut+ta li swA hA/ ut+tha li swA hA/ ku ti bi ri ti swA hA/ tsi ti bi ti ha ti swA hA/ na mo badzra

pA Ni s+ya/ a la li ma la ri bi li ni/ pa ra ma li ni shi li/ li bi ba li/ lo ti pUr+Na garba sharba narba/ turba ut+ta put+ta narba tsarba sharba malba dzalba ralba swA hA/ e hi shI g+h+raM badzra pA Ni he hi he hi/ tu ri tu ri/ la hU~M la hU~M swA hA/ sma ra tAn+ta ka rAn+ta ti dz+nyA taM mi ti ri ti mi ti ri ti/ mi di ti ti li/ ri ri ri/ khu khu

lu khu khu ti la hU~M ri ti e hi twaM/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ti li ri li ri/ ba si ri ri ki ri ti sma ri ma hA sma ri u dzu ri ge tsu ru tsu ru ti swA hA/ tarba b+harba marba khu khu la khu ti li/ tu ru tu ru/ sma ra taM pra ti dz+nyAM swA hA/ 'gro lding zhes bya'i snying po 'di/ /'jig rten gsum grags 'jig rten gyi/ /rab kyi mchog gi

gtso bo ste/ /lag na rdo rje gsum pa yin/ /'jig rten gsum mchog gtso bos kyang / /'di las 'gal bar byed mi nus/ /'jig rten gsum mchog 'jig gsum dbang / /tshangs pa la sogs snying po'i bar/ /de yi bsgrub pa de nyid de/ /de yi las rnams rgyas pa yang / /

rtsed mo can dang gtum po bzhin/ /'di yang de ltar bya ba ste/ /bsgrub pa'i mdo tsam bshad bya na/ /gtsang ma'i mis ni gtsang ma'i phyogs/ /dri dang phreng ba byug pa rnams/ /mchod dang khyad par 'phags pa yis/ /mchod rten yang na sku gzugs rnams/ /sku gdung ldan pa mchod

par bya/ /rdo rje bris pa legs mchod nas/ /ri mo'i sku gzugs nub phyogs bstan/ /yar gyi tshes brgyad brtsams byas la/ /sbrang rtsi 'o thug mar dang bcas/ /dus gsum za zhing rig sngags bzlas/ /thang chu bzang po bsreg par bya/ /lci ba sogs par legs par bkru/ /dag

pas shar phyogs bltas te 'dug /shin tu mnyam gzhag dus gsum du/ /lan grangs brgyad brgya bzlas brjod bya/ /de nas yid du 'ong ba yi/ mchod pa las bzhin mjug tu bya/ /zla bya phyed ni 'das nas kyang / /nya yi nub mo spyan yang drang / /lha yi gnas ni mthong ba des/ /cho ga

mchog gis bsrung bar bya/ /brgya rtsa brgyad ni brjod byas na/ /de nas rdo rje can yang mthong / /de nas gzhan yang stong gi phyed/ /ci ste gus pas 'dun pas mchod/ /rdo rje 'dzin chen mngon sum du/ /mthong 'gyur de la the tshom med/ /mchod sbyin mchog gi gtso bo des/ /de la

dam pa sbyin pa 'gyur/ /yang na 'khor los sgyur ba nyid/ /'dod pa gzhan lta ci zhig smos/ /ji skad bshad pa'i cho ga dang / /ji skad bshad pa'i slar gtang dang / /ji skad bshad pa'i las rnams kyang / /mjug tu legs par bya ba yin/ /'gro lding gi cho ga dang bcas pa rdzogs so// //

sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde'i bdag po chen po lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/ de nas gdon sbyin gyi sde'i bdag po chen po lag na rdo rjes bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar

te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ spyi bor thal mo sbyar te dul ba mchog gis gnas nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis skye bo mang po la sman pa'i slad du bdag nyid kyi snying po 'jig rten dag la bshad lags te/ bdag gi snying

po ni 'di lags so/ /gang gis snying po 'dis bdag bkug na de'i thad du bdag myur du mchi bar 'tshal lo/ /ci ste bdag snying po 'dis bkug pa las ma mchis na 'jig rten la la mtshams ma mchis par bgyid cing dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyid pa gang lags pa de dag

gi skye gnas su mchi bar 'gyur ro/ bcom ldan 'das de bas na zhag gcig smyung bar bgyis pas bdag bkug na de las bcom ldan 'das kyis slar gtang du gsol/ lag na rdo rjes de skad ces gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yid tsam 'dzum pa mdzad de 'di skad ces

bka' stsal to/ /lag na rdo rje legs so legs so/ /khyod kyis 'jig rten dag la khas blangs pas khyod la nga mnyes kyis/ gnod sbyin gyi sde'i bdag po chen po khyod song song la dad pa dang ldan pa yi chad par ma byed cig /de lta mod kyi nga yang khyod kyi snying po nyan par ni 'dod do/ /de skad ces

bka' stsal to/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde'i bdag po chen po lag na rdo rjes gdong yid tsam phab nas 'dzem bzhin du bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bdag gi snying po cho ga dang bcas pa gsan du gsol/ 'di bsgrub par 'tshal zhing bcom ldan 'das la mchod par dga'

bas yar gyi ngo tshes gcig la brtsams te zas su 'o ma dang phyi'i 'de gu 'tshal te/ dus gsum du ba lang gi lci bas khrus bgyis la/ gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos nas bdug pa bsreg cing sku gdung dang ldan pa'i mchod rten nam/ /sku gzugs kyi mdun du mchod pa rgyas par bgyis

la snying po brjod par bgyi ste/ /gsang sngags kyi tshigs 'di dag gis thog mar bdag nyid bsrung bar bgyi'i/ /na mo rat+na tra ya s+ya/ /na mo badzra pA Ni s+ya/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa taM s+ya/ shrI nu at+t+rai b+ha/ badzra bA Ni ma ti shi ba mA nA ya/ a n+yo n+ya badzra a sha nir namaH sarba gra ha duSh+Ta a pa ra ti shu rak+Sha

yaM ma nash+tsa a b+ha yA ka ri hi hi badzra pA Ni hi hi he ha hi/ hi ri ku ku bu/ hi ri ku pi sa ra sa ra su bi ri tsi ri badzra pA Ni durdan+tA nAM/ da ma ka da ma da ma swA hA/ lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis nas lag pa la btags na sems can thams cad kyis mi thub par 'gyur ro/ /na mo rat+na tra ya s+ya/ na mo badzra pA Ni s+ya/ ma hA

yak+Sha se nA pa ti s+ya/ e hi badzra pA Ni/ i daM aM b+ha ha na ma nu sma ra ma hA s+thi ra badzra/ e hi su s+thi ra badzra/ e hi na ma pA badzra/ e hi a pra ti ha ta badzra/ e hi shI g+h+raM ma na tsa pa la ga ti ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ti/ badzra pA Ni hi hi he hi hi he hi hi he hi hi he hi hi he he/ ku tu ku tu ku tu ku tu badzra pA Ni e

hi/ hi hi he/ hi hi hi hi hi/ hi hi hi hi hi hi hi hi/ badzra pA Ni ku ku bu ku ku bu ku ku bu/ ku b+h+ya ku b+h+ya/ ku ku b+h+ya/ badzra pA Ni/ sa ra sa ra/ e bai ri/ e bai ri/ ha ra ni li/ a ba ha ya mi twaM/ ma ma hi sa mA ye no pa tiSh+Ta swA hA/ lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i

thang chu'i bdug pas spyan drang bar bgyi'o/ /na mo rat+na tra ya s+ya/ na mo badzra pA Ni s+ya/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ti s+ya/ hi ri hi ri ni/ badzra pA Ni/ pra te gr-ih+Na/ A hu tiM/ uSh+paM d+hU paM gan+d+ha mA l+yeM/ ma twaM/ sa ma yo b+ha d+hi sh+ye ti swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das dam tshig bgyi ba dang / de dag gi me tog

dbul ba lags te/ me tog rnams ci nas kyang sku gzugs kyi dbu la bab par gyen du gtor bar bgyi ste/ ba ru ra'i yam sreg shing brgyad brgya sbrang rtsi dang mar gyi nang du smyugs pas sbyin sreg bgyi'o/ /na mo rat+na tra ya s+ya/ na mo badzra pA Ni s+ya/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ti s+ya/ mu ne mu ne

mu ne mu ne mu ne mu ne/ ri ma ti ma ti ma ti ma hA ma ti su ma ti/ smra ras ma yaM badzra pA Ni e raN+Ti li s+phu ti pha te phuH/ b+hi li ki ti/ tsi ri li ti ti ko ra la hi t+ti li si ri ba la ti/ ba di phu tsit+ti/ ma re te phuH/ khu khu ti khu ti li li ti ri swA hA/ mu na mu na ne badzra pA Ni/ gan+d+ha mA l+ya a nu le ba na ma pra tIts+tsha/ ku tu

li ku tu ku tu li swA hA/ tsa ti li swA hA/ tu tu b+ha ri swA hA/ bid+ya ma tu ti li swA hA/ a ra li ma ra li/ sha li ni badzra mA li ni/ bi lit+ti/ si ri li bi/ g+hur+Na g+hur+Na sharba sarba narba brah+ma/ b+ha t+ta puN+ya narba sarba/ harba darba rarba tsarba rba swA hA/ e hi shI g+h+raM badzra pA Ni he he hau hau/ tu ru/ tu ru/ tu ru/ tu ru/

tu ru/ la hi la hu la hu la hu swA hA/ sma ra taM/ nA ga riM/ yat+t+ra seM/ pra tidz+nyA taM/ bud+d+ha sa kA she/ ut+ta hr-i da ya/ mi ti ri ti/ mi ti ri ti/ ma ti ma ti ti ti/ la ri swA hA/ khu la lu lu khu khu ti lu ti swA hA/ e hi twaM ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ti/ hi li ri ri ti b+h+yo/ ma ri ki ri dzaM sa ri dzam+b+ha/ shu

ri tsi ti/ tsu ru tsu ru tsu ru/ li ti swA hA/ narba sharba b+harba khu khu lu khu khu ti ti swA hA/ tu ru tu ru sma ra twaM/ pra ti dz+nyAM/ badzra pA Ni swA hA/ ha la ha lA ya swA hA/ ku lu ku lA ya swA hA/ ka la ka lA ya swA hA/ kI li kI lA ya swA hA/ ma hA kI li kI lA ya swA hA/ kro d+ha kI li

kI lA ya swA hA/ tri ba ta kI li kI la ya swA hA/ tsaN+Da kI li kI li lA ya swA hA/ badzra kI li kI lA ya swA hA/ badzra d+ha rA ya swA hA/ badzre b+hany+dza ya swA hA/ badzra pA Na ye swA hA/ hi li mi li ni li/ o~M sum+b+ha sum+b+ha/ phu ru phu ru saM b+hany+dza nA ma b+ha be b+h+yaHswA hA/ bcom ldan 'das snying po 'di ni las

thams cad bgyid pa lags te/ don thams cad la gzhan gyis mi thub cing don mchis pa dang / zhi ba dang / zhi bar bgyi ba dang / dgra 'joms shing gzhan gyis mi tshugs pa lags te/ thang chu dang / sra rtsi'i pog dang / pog dkar po dang / a ga ru'i bdug pa bsreg shing brjod par

bgyi'o/ /phyag 'tshal ba ni snga ma nyid de/ ha ri ha ri Ni/ badzra pA Ni/ muny+tsa d+ha/ ha sa na sbA hA/ khi ri khi ra zhes smos pas dgod par 'gyur ro/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo hi li mu li li mu badzra pA Ni tsu ru tsu ru/ dzalba dzalba swA hA/ bdug pa de dag nyi shu dag dang sbyar bar bgyi'o/ /na mo rat+na

tra ya s+ya/ hi li ha ri badzra pA Ni pa ti s+ya/ sid+ha b+hak+to smi swA hA/ ba dan dmar po phyar te dbul bar bgyi'o/ /lag na rdo rje'i snying po 'di ni sems can thams la bde ba'i phyir las thams cad byed pa yin no/ /lag na rdo rje'i snying po rdzogs so// //sngar bshad blon mo 'bar

ba gang / /de dag kun gyi mchog gyur pa/ /'dod pa yi ni rdo rje ma/ 'bar ba de ni bshad par bya/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lag na rdo rje dang / 'dod pa'i dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa'o/ /de nas 'dod pa'i dbang phyug rig sngags

'chang dang bcas par bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rig sngags byas nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rig sngags kyi blon mo zhes bgyi ba de bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag gis bshad

par 'tshal na/ dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams la sman par 'gyur ba dang / rtsed mo dang las thams cad bgyid pa dang / las thams cad bsgrub pa'i slad du bzhes su gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ 'dod pa'i dbang

phyug nga'i nyan thos dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma 'dod chags dang ldan pa dang yod de/ de dag gi bar du gcod par 'gyur gyis thong shig /de ltar 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gis lan gsum gyis bar du bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom

ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma 'dod chags dang ldan pa ma mchis pa de dag la rig sngags kyi rtsed mor 'gyur na/ bdag gi de bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes su gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rtag tu zham ring na 'dug cing g.yon

phyogs na gnas/ gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje la gzigs so/ /de nas gnod sbyin lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la bltas nas 'dod pa'i dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'dod pa'i dbang phyug skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba'i phyir rig sngags de shod

cig shod cig /de nas 'dod pa'i dbang phyug dga' zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te de'i tshe rig sngags 'di bshad do/ /s+yAd ya the da na/ i ti yo ba pa ti sam+ba ti b+ha ya ni/ tsi li ta ni tsa/ yo ta na d+harma ma bi dza ni ti pra ban+tu naM/ a ti kra naM taM

bai ma de ba nA ma se na ti sarba sid+d+ha tsa yo gi ni/ ye na sit+t+ye na/ b+ha ga bAM/ shA sta lo ke a nut+ta ra/ a te na saM t+yaM bA tsa ne na/ a yim bit+tsa sa mu dza sa ma y+ya bi da/ khi ni khi ni/ kuN+Da la mu khu ki swA hA/ ku tiny+dza re ku tiny+dza ye/ tham+pu le/ suM de kuM phe ba ste/ pra se a ga ste thaM ga ti ni pa ka sid+d+ha

karma bi nA sha ni ya ya karma ma hA sra ni/ pra yuk+ta ni ba na ye ta/ kr-i taM ya ma/ in+d+rA ga ni/ man+t+ri Na/ tsit+ta ro ri sha ba/ tsa tur+Ni shan su kr-i taM kun+da/ tsUr+Na yo go ba di ye te/ su hr-i dra dre/ s+t+raM hr-i da yaM/ ba sham+baM/ bash+tsa hr-i da ya/ bi d+ye shwa na/ dzam+b+ha naM/ stam+b+ha naM/ mo ha naM/ tsa ka ri shI ti/

tsaN+Da lI bar+Sha dzA/ bi te pra yuk+ta mU la karma su pA ta pAM su rA dzA na tsai ba sarba me da ni kA ra yed da/ e ka ut+ta ba ne to/ de ni ri ba ra bi nA sha ne sarba karma ri bid+ya de marda dat+ta/ pA she s+yAt+te/ badzra pA Ni/ ma te gau ri/ bid+ya rA dzA a nut+ta ra/ o~M dzam+b+ha ya swA hA/ stam+b+hA ya swA hA/ mo

hA ya swA hA/ mA lA ya swA hA/ ya mA ya swA hA/ ya ma ma mA ya swA hA/ badzrA ya swA hA/ ma hA badzrA ya swA hA/ badzra d+ha rA ya swA hA/ badzra pA Na ye swA hA/ badzra hastA ya swA hA/ badzro gra hastA ya swA hA/ badzra daN+DA ya swA hA/ badzro gra daN+DA ya swA hA/ bi shwa pA Na ye swA hA/ na maHkA me shwa ra

badzra pA Na ye swA hA/ rig sngags 'dod pa'i rdo rje ma/ /'di ni rlung gi shugs zhes bya/ /'dod pa'i khams ni kun gyi mchog /rig sngags rgyal mo bla na med/ /'dod pa'i khams gnas ci yang rung / /'dod pa'am 'dod pa zhig bar rung / rab tu bsgrubs na de dag ni/ /don du

mi sgrub gang yang med/ /las kyi dam pa ji bzhin dang / /khyad par dang ni bsgrub pa'i mchog /de nyid thog mar bshad par bya/ /rang byung la ni phyag byas nas/ /sangs rgyas byang chub shing drung du/ /shar phyogs blta zhing 'dug par bya/ /kar ni ka ra'i me tog dang / /de ni

btso ma'i gser mdog 'dra/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni g.yas logs su/ /rigs mchog rab sbyin shes nyen can/ /'dod pa'i dbang phyug rma bya yi/ /mgrin pa bzhin du sngo bar bri/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni g.yon logs su/ /mnga' bdag rdo rje 'dzin chen ni/ /sprin dmar mdog 'dra 'od dang

bcas/ /dpal mchog pad+mar bzhugs pa bri/ /de nas mar gyi brgyad la brtsams/ /nas kyi zas bza' dus sum cu/ /dus gsum du ni bsgrim bya zhing / /cho ga 'di ni rtag tu bya/ /me tog dkar po sngon po dang / /dmar po dang ni rnam pa gsum/ /blangs te gnas der zhugs nas

ni/ /cho ga bzhin du mchod par bya/ /der ni lnga bcu gcig bzlas pas/ /tshes grangs bcu gnyis bar du yang / /dkar bo sangs rgyas bsnun par bya/ /sngon pos 'dod pa'i dbang phyug la/ /pad+ma dmar po la sogs pas/ /lag na rdo rje bsnun pas kyang / /zhag gsum khrus byas

gso sbyong ldan/ /lnga yi ni gtsang ma yis/ /lha bshos sna tshogs kun tu dgram/ /du ru skra dang a ga ru/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni bdug mchog bsreg /thang chu'i snod ni tha dad gzhag /lag na rdo rje gu gul dbul/ /sangs rgyas rig sngags rdo rje 'dzin/ /slob dpon

la ni gus mchod bya/ /de nas sems ni bsdus nas kyang / /mchod pa dag ni rgyas par bya/ /bden pa bzhi ni ston pa pos/ /me tog dkar po bcom ldan la/ /bzhi brgya'am brgyad brgya dam pa yis/ /bzlas shing bzlas shing bsnun par bya/ /sngo ba'i nang na mdog sngon

mchog /sum brgyas 'dod pa'i dbang phyug la/ /dmar ba'i nang na mdog dmar mchog /sum brgyas rdo rje 'dzin la bsnun/ /bsrung ba la ni khri lam du/ /zla gcig brgyad brgya bzlas brjod bya/ /bsgrub pa thog ma tha mar yang / skud pa nag pos bcing bar bya/ /ba ti bi da

ra rak+Sha d+ha re rak+Sha/ ma hA d+ha ni rak+Sha/ ta thA ga ta sa ha dzA ta rak+Sha/ puSh+pa ke ru rak+Sha/ a pa ta rak+Sha swA hA/ rtsa ba'i skud pa gtsang byas nas/ /bsgrub pa de ltar bsrung byas la/ /mtshams bcad pa ni 'dis byas na/ /mtshams bcad kun gyi mchog tu 'gyur/ /d+ha ni ka ni d+ha ne ke ni

sarba sI ma ban+d+ha ni swA hA/ mtshams bcad kyi ni me 'di yang / /brgyad brgya bzlas sam yang na ni/ /de bzhin tshon skud sna tshogs kyis/ /gnas rnams kun tu bskor bar bya/ /dngos grub bsgrub cing nor 'dod pas/ dngos grub ltas ni blta ba'i phyir/ /rig sngags rgyal

dbang grub rnams kyi/ /bsgrub pa'i tshig ni bzlas brjod bya/ /a gaM de sA d+ha ya a mo g+he sA d+ha ya/ sa pa le sa d+hA ya ut+sa de sat+t+ye t+ya ge pradz+nye u pa sha Ne sA d+ha ya swA hA/ de nas rig sngags sgrub pa na/ /mtshan ma dag ni rtogs par bya/ /sku gdung ldan pa'i sku gzugs de/ /nyi ma

bzhin du 'bar bar 'gyur/ /dad dang mchod pa'i nyes pa dang / /rig sngags nyams pa'i nyes pa yis/ /ci ste der na ma grub na/ /yar gyi ngo la'ang bsgrub par bya/ /dad dang mchod dang cho ga yis/ /de bzhin rdzogs par brtsam par bya/ /dus gsum gtsang sbra rdzogs bya zhing / /

nas kyi kha zas dus su bza'/ /bzlas brjod 'dun pas mtshan ma gsum/ /ma byung bar du bzlas brjod bya/ /sangs rgyas zhal nas an+d+ra rnyil/ yang na mthon ka chen po 'byung / /'dod pa'i dbang phyung kha nas kyang / /bzang po dkyil 'khor steng du lhung / /

lag na rdo rje'i kha nas kyang / /phun sum tshogs pa'i dbyig rnams 'byung / /yid bzhin nor bu 'dra ba yi/ /nor bu legs sdug mgo la gdags/ /'dod na g.yas pa'i mkhrig mar yang / /cho ga bzhin du gdags par bya/ /sa dang nam mkha' snang byed cing / /'khor

los sgyur ba gzhan bzhin 'gyur/ /nor bu'i mthus ni 'jigs byed cing / /rig sngags grub mthus stobs chen 'gyur/ /des ni mun par 'jigs byed cing / /rgya mtsho chen por 'jigs pa med/ /'dod pa dag la mchod par 'gyur/ /rig sngags mchog bsgrub skyabs kyi

mchog /de yang rin chen spyod kun gyi/ /nang na tshugs par nus pa med/ /mu stegs rnams kyis kun rig bzhin/ /ji ltar dbang phyug 'dod la spyod/ /'dod pa lhag ma de bzhin du/ /rig pa'i rgyal po mchog bsgrub ste/ /'dod la mngon du spyod par 'gyur/ /ci ste dad cing gus

pa dang / /lag na rdo rje cho ga shes/ de yang rdo rje 'dzin bzhin du/ /'jig rten gsum na 'jigs med rgyu/ /dbyig rnams dang ni dong tse dag /'phags pa la las bsgrub na yang / /gnyis ka des bsgrub 'jigs pa med/ /bde can dag dang ldan pa dang / /nag mo chen dang ldan

pa des/ /mngon du yid bzhin nor bu 'chang / /grong khyer rgyal po bzhin du 'thob/ /bya ba mang las brten pa dang / /rnam pa mang po sna tshogs pa/ /mang po 'di dag ci smos te/ /mdo tsam 'di ni mnyan par gyis/ /'dod pa yi no rdo rje ma/ /'di ni las kun bsgrub pa ste/ /blon mo

rnams kyi dam pa'i mchog /las rnams kun la don yon pa/ /ci ste yid la 'dod pa yi/ /dngos grub bde mchog dgongs na yang / /bya ba'i don kun grub pa yi/ /'bod ba'i rdo rje ma nyid bsgrub/ /rtag tu rang dgar bde ba sbyin/ /rang dgar 'gro ba'i gzhi yang yin/ /rang

dgar rtse zhing spyod pa yang / /'chang ba la sogs rang dgar 'gyur/ /'di ni spro ba'i dad can la/ /nams kyang rgyab kyis phyogs mi 'gyur/ /bsgrub pa de yang 'joms mi byed/ /'bras bu med par mi 'gyur la/ /bgegs kyang byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /dkyil 'khor

las ni nyams gyur dang / /dam tshig dang kyang spangs pa dang / /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin mchog sogs/ /ma dad rnams la grub mi 'gyur/ /de phyir dkon mchog gsum po dang / /de bzhin rdo rje 'dzin pa dang / /rig sngags rang gi bla ma la/ /gus byas mchod cing

bsgrub par bya/ /rtsa ba'i rig sngags stobs ldan pa/ /las rnams stong dag 'grub byed pa/ /gang yin de dag shes par gyis/ /kri ki ma la ka yi shing / /yam sreg shing ni brgya rtsa brgyad/ /gtsang ma'i phyogs su me sbar te/ /

cho ga dang ni rgyas par bya/ /zhag bdun bar du dus gsum du/ /de bzhin bzlas brjod brgyad brgya bya/ /mar bcas 'o thug sbrang rtsir ldan/ /me mchog sbyin sreg byas na ni/ 'dis ni rgyal po'am yang na ni/ /'khor los sgyur ba'ang dbang gyur na/ /rgyal srid dag

la phan pa yi/ /rgyal po'i 'khor lta ci zhing smos/ /lan tshwa las ni gzugs byas nas/ /rkang pas nas brtsams sbyin sreg bya/ /cho ga des ni bud med dang / /skyes pa dbang du 'gugs par 'gyur/ /bu mo yi ni gzugs byas nas/ /rkang pa nas brtsams sbyin sreg bya/ /

cho ga des ni bud med rnams/ /dbang du bya ba bstan pa yin/ /lo ma'i sbrang ma'i dpung byas nas/ /yungs kar me tog bsregs pa yis/ /de bzhin zhag bdun dus gsum du/ /rab tu bsgrims te mchod par bya/ /de ni yungs kar me tog gis/ /zhag bdun bar du bsgrubs

na ni/ /lan bdun bzlas pa 'grub 'gyur te/ /lo ma'i sbrang ma 'phro bar 'gyur/ /cho ga dag ni mchog dang ni/ /de bzhin man ta ka blangs nas/ /bzlas brjod brgyad brgya bzlas bya zhing / /thog mar legs par mchod byas nas/ /gang gi ming ni brjod pa de/ /skad cig gis ni dbang

du 'gyur/ /de bzhin cho ga byas nas ni/ /nan ta ka ni phyi nas blang / /a ga ru dang tsan+dan dang / /ma ru pa ka rlon pa blang / /dri la sogs pa de dag gis/ /khrus byas skye bo thams cad dgra/ /thog mar mchod pa la sogs pa/ /byed cing byed cing zhag bdun du/ /

dus gsum brgyad brgya bzlas brjod bya/ /phyi nas mkhas pas khrus kyang bya/ /mar gyi ngo ni bcu bzhi la/ /bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad byas na/ /rgyal pos de la mchod par bya/ /bong nga yi ni rtsa ba yang / /byang phyogs blta zhing brko bar bya/ /de nas de yi shun lpags ni/ /mar gyi ngo yi bcu

bzhi la/ /phye mar byas nas bzlas brjod bya/ /de bzhin brgyad brgya bzlas nas ni/ /phur mar byas te bcang bar bya/ /bud med la ni des gtor na/ /de ma bag tu dbang du 'gyur/ /thams cad dbye bar bya ba ni/ /nim pa'i yal ga bsreg bya zhing / /'di dang 'di gnyis rtsod gyur cig /ces

bya cho ga gsang ba yin/ /de las phyir gso dam pa ni/ /gsang sngags 'dis ni bkru bar bya/ /dri la sogs pas snying nas mchod/ /bzlas brjod brgyad brgya byas na ni/ /byad stems dgrol ba'i mchog yin te/ /ci dga' bar ni brtsam bya zhing / /zhag bdun bar du bsgrubs na ni/ /

mi song 'jigs med 'bab par 'gyur/ /kar+Na pi lu li gcig dang / /ske tshe'i 'bru dang lan tshwa dang / /nim pa'i 'bru dang ras bal gyi/ /sa bon de dag sbyin sreg bya/ /'di nas gzhan du che ge mo/ /song shig bros shig med gyur cig /ces ni ming yang brjod byas na/ 'gro 'gyur 'di

la the tshom med/ /de las slar ni gso ba dang / /bzhag par byas na lan bdun du/ /de la bsrung ba mchog byas na/ /gnas su dga' bar byed par 'gyur/ /pa ta la yi lo ma dang / /bil ba 'dzam bu a mra dang / /skyu ru ra la sogs pa yis/ /skal chung de ni khrus byas na/ /skal dang

ldan par byed pa'i mchog /gos 'dod pa sha'i me tog rnams/ /sbyin sreg byas na gos rnams thob/ hir+Na ne mu li ki rnams/ /sbyin sreg byas na dbyig rnams 'phel/ /gser 'dod pas ni su bar+Na/ tshul bzhin sbyin sreg byas na 'thob/ /gser bsgrub pa yi nang na ni/ /cho ga 'di ni
