tu brgya byin rgyal po ste/ /de bzhin smin drug mdun du'o/ /tshangs pa lag na gdugs 'dzin pa/ /kha ba me tog kun+da dang / /zla 'dra brgya byin mdun bri ste/ /rang gi stan la 'khod par ro/ /yang na sngags pas mu tig dang / /ba yi zho 'dra dkar po ni/ /rnga yab thogs par

smin drug bri/ /tshangs pa kha dog dmar po bri/ /brgya byin kha dog ser po bri/ /rgyan kun gyis ni rnam spras shing / /rnga yab thogs par khyab 'jug bri/ /de bzhin khyu mchog la zhon par/ /lha chen po ni bri bya ste/ /kun bged lag na 'khor lo can/ /ngang pa la zhon bri bar bya/ /

brgya byin glang chen zhon pa ste/ /smin drug rma bya la zhon pa'o/ /phyi rol dang ni grwa rnams su/ /'byung mo brgyad ni bri bar bar bya/ /pad+ma can dang pad chen dang / /rnam 'byung ma dang lha 'joms ma/ /'phrog ma mchog dang rin po che/ /rgyan ma 'gro ba skyong ma rnams/ /dpal gyi sgra yis

ra ba grags pa'i/ /'byung mo chen mo brgyad po ste/ /pad+ma can dang pad chen ma/ /pad+ma dkar po lta bur bri/ /rnam 'byung ma dang lha 'joms ma/ /kha dog dmar po bri bar bya/ /'byung mo bzhi rnams mtshungs par ni/ /gser gyi mdog tu bri bar bya/ /rdzu 'phrul che ldan 'byung

mo brgyad/ /ji ltar bstan bzhin de legs bri/ /de nas 'dir dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bshad pa/ rdo rje slob dpon bdag nyid me tog sngon po'i phreng bas brgyan cing gtsug tor sngon po bcings nas ras sngon po zung gcig bgos te sngon bzhin du khro bo'i snying po 'di brjod par bya ste/ sems

can kun la phan don du/ /myur du dngos grub sbyin mdzad pa/ /grub pa'i rdo rje khro bo ste/ /lha nyid dam tshig la bzhugs shig /o~M hU~M badzra phaT sa/ 'di brjod pa tsam gyis lha thams cad grub par byed do/ /de nas 'dir rdo rje gsor ba bshad pa/ /'di ltar yi ge hU~M zlos

shing phyag na rdo rjes gsungs pa ltar/ lha thams cad gzhom zhing lha'i bu mo thams cad dang / gnod sbyin mo dang / klu mo dang / 'byung mo rdzu 'phrul chen mo can rnams skad cig de nyid la gzhom par bya ste/ rdo rje gsor ba'i sbyor ba dang ldan pas/ o~M badzra dIp+ta ma hA kro d+ha ha na da ha pa tsa

mA ra ya hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ skad cig de nyid la lha thams cad gsod cing 'khrug par byed do/ /hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ sbyor ba 'dis kyang nges par sangs rgyas rnams kyang zhig par byed do/ /de nas slob ma gzhug par bya ste/ khro bo'i phyag rgya go cha byas la

sngags 'dis dbab par bya'o/ /oM bi sh+ya kro d+ha hU~M hU~M a dz+wa la ma la a ku la/ b+hi Sha Na badzra a/ 'di brjod pa tsam gyis phyi rol gyi dbab pa dang dgug pa dang ltung bar bya ba rnams nus par 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud chen po las khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga

rgyas par bshad pa/ o~M b+hU shrI sid+ha d+h+wa dza d+hi ri hrIH/ khro bo'i mdun du'o/ /o~M hU~M b+h+ra~M ma hA pad+ma ba ti d+ha nur ban d+ha ri hU~M/ rgyab tu'o/ /o~M hU~M bi hU~M ti/ o~M ku sho d+hA ri Ni hU~M dza/ lho ru'o/ /hU~M b+hU su ra ha ri Ni tsin+tA ma Ni d+hA dzad+hA ra Ni sru~M/ g.yon du'o/ /o~M shrI bar ha ri Ni puSh+pa ha ste

hU~M/ me tog dbang ldan gyi grwar/ o~M shrI rah+ne shwa ri d+hu pa haste hU~M/ spos me'i grwa ru 'o/ /o~M shrI b+hU Shi Ni gan+d+ha ha ste hU~M/ dri bden bral du'o/ /o~M shrI dza ga ta pA li ni a d+hi pa ti hU~M/ mar me rlung du'o/ /de nas 'byung mo brgyad kyi phyag rgya'i cho ga rgyas par bshad pa khu tshur phan tshun

bcangs te mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ba ni seng ge'i rgyal mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa g.yon pa khu tshur bcangs te gung mo brkyang ba ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan gyi phyag rgya'o/ /phyag rgya 'di nyid rked pa'i phyogs su bzhag pa ni gzhu dang mda'i phyag rgya'o/ lag pa

g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs te/ mdzub mo brkyang ba nas bskyil ba ni lcags kyu'i phyag rgya'o/ /thal mo mnyam par sbyar te/ mdzub mo gnyis bkug pa ni me tog gi phyag rgya'o/ /sor mo rnams phan tshun du 'khyud de mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ba ni spos kyi phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa so sor

brkyang ste/ dpung pa'i rtsa ba gnyis su bzhag pa ni dri'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs te/ gung mo'i sor mo rab tu brkyang ba ni mar me'i phyag rgya'o/ /'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa'i le'u'o// //de nas 'byung

po brgyad kyi sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga rgyas par bshad pa/ o~M hrIHdzaH/ gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i'o/ /o~M hU~M dzaH/ rgyal ba'i'o/ /o~M hrI dzaH/ rdzogs byed kyi'o/ /o~M b+hu~M dzaH/ kun tu rdzogs byed kyi'o/ /o~M sru~M dzaH/ dur khrod kyi bdag po'i'o/ /o~M ru dzaH/ rig sngags kyi dbang phyug gi'o/ /o~M hri hU~M dzaH/ 'byung po'i dbang

phyug gi'o/ /o~M a~M dzaH/ mngag gzhug mchog gi'o/ /'byung po gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs bshad pa/ rdo rje 'chang gi khyim du song ste/ sngon du 'bum bzlas te/ sngon du bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas zla ba nya la mchod pa rgya chen po byas te/ ci ltar gsungs

pa'i 'bras chan dkar po dang / sbrang rtsi dang zho dang / bu ram dang 'o ma dang / sha rnams kyis mchod cing gu gul gyi bdug pa byin nas/ mtshan thog thag bzlas na tho rangs nges par 'ong ngo / /gal te nges par ma 'ongs na skad cig de la 'chi'o/ /'ongs na bsgo ba don med par mi byed

do/ /sgrub pa pos mngag gzhug gyis shig ces bsgo na de phan chad mngag gzhug gi las byed la rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal srid ster bar byed cing dgra thams cad tshar gcod par byed do/ /zla ba'i lha mo blangs nas ster zhing rgyab tu zhon na lha'i 'jig rten du yang 'khyer bar byed do/ /brgya

byin nyid kyang ster bar byed cing bskal pa bdun 'tsho'o/ /de nas rgyal ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs bshad pa/ mtshan mo sbyin byed ma'i mdun du song ste/ nyi ma re re stong phrag brgyad brgyad bzlas na nyi ma bdun pa la mchod pa rgyas par byas te/ gtor ma sbyin zhing gu gul gyi bdug pa byin nas

bzlas na bzlas pa'i mtha' la nges par 'ong ste/ kye sgrub pa pos bka' ci stsal zhes smra bar byed do/ /sgrub pa pos mngag gzhug gyis shig ces bsgo nas rgyab tu zhon na gling bzhi pa rnams su yang khyer bar byed cing gzhan yang rgyal srid ster la lo lnga stong 'tsho'o/ /de nas rdzogs

byed kyi sgrub pa'i thabs bshad pa/ rdo rje 'chang gi pho brang du song ste nyi ma bdun du stong phrag brgyad brgyad bzlas nas nyi ma bdun pa la mchod pa rgyas par byas te/ 'bras chan dkar po dang / zhos ji ltar gsungs pa ltar byin nas ci srid nam phyed kyi bar du bzlas na nam phyed na rang nyid 'ong

ngo / /'ongs pa la me tog gi mchod yon byin na dga' bar 'gyur te/ rgyal srid ster bar byed do/ /bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed cing lo stong 'tsho'o/ /ji srid 'tsho ba de srid du mngag gzhug gi las byed do/ /che ge mo 'tsho bar gyis shig /che ge mo sod cig ces smras

na de dag thams cad byed do/ /kun tu rdzogs byed kyi sgrub pa'i thabs bshad pa sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du khri bzlas na sngon du bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas zla ba nya la ci ltar 'byor pa'i mchod pa chen po byas te/ ci srid nam phyed kyi bar du bzlas na nam phyed na

rings par 'ongs nas mdun du sdod do/ /kye sdug pa ngas ci bya zhes smra bar byed do/ /sgrub pa pos mngag gzhug gyis shig ces bsgo na de phan chad mngag gzhug gi las thams cad byed do/ /gnod sbyin gyi bu mo bzang mo blangs nas ster zhing gter thams cad ster la lhas 'dod pa'i

bza' ba ster ro/ /nyin gcig bzhin du ras dmar po zung re ster zhing dong tse lnga lnga ster la lo lnga brgya 'tsho'o/ /de nas dur khrod kyi bdag po'i sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga rgyas par bshad pa/ mtshan mo dur khrod du song ste nyi ma bdun du stong phrag brgyad bzlas na nyi ma bdun pa la 'byung

po la sha dang / nya dang / til dang / 'dzam bu ti dang / mngar gsum zan gyis dril ba'i ril bu dang / rta sha kham tshad du gtubs pa bsregs nas mar la rngos la 'dzam bu ti ka dang / 'bras chan dang / zho dang / bu ram dang / 'o thug dang / sran tshod dang / snum khur

rnams kyis ci ltar gsungs pa byin nas gu gul gyi bdug pa yang byin te/ ci srid nam phyed kyi bar du bzlas na ha ha zhes bya ba'i sgra thos par byed de/ 'jigs par ma byas na rang gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor te 'ong ngo / /'ongs pa la gtor ma byin na dga' bar 'gyur te/ 'byung

po'i mngag gzhug thams cad byed do/ /nyi ma re re dong tse brgyad brgyad ster zhing dgra thams cad 'joms te lo lnga stong 'tsho'o/ /de nas rigs kyi dbang phyug gi sgrub pa'i thabs bshad pa/ lha'i khang par song ste/ spos dmar po dang / me tog dmar po dang / gu gul gyi bdug pa

sbyin zhing khri bzlas na sngon du bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /mtshan mo nag po'i tshes bcu bzhi la nya dang / sha dang til dang 'dzam bu ti dang / 'bras chan dmar pos ji lta bar sgrub cing du ru ska dang me tog sbyin te/ ji srid nam phyed kyi bar du bzlas na nam phyed na snang ba chen po dang /

'jigs par byed pa'i gzugs kyis 'ong ste/ de la 'jigs par ma byas na sdug pa ngas ci bya zhes smra bar byed do/ /sgrub pa pos mngag gzhug gyis shig ces bsgo na/ nyi ma re dus gsum du dong tse lnga lnga ster bar byed do/ /lhas mngon par 'dod pa'i bza' ba ster bar byed

cing lo lnga stong 'tsho'o/ /de nas 'byung po'i dbang phyug gi sgrub pa'i thabs bshad pa/ mtshan mo ling ka gcig par song ste/ gcig pu nub gsum du 'bras chan dmar po dang nya dang shas gtor ma sbyin zhing ra skyes kyi sha dang / gu gul dang / sbrang rtsi dang ldan pa'i bdug

pas bdug cing stong phrag brgyad bzlas na/ nyi ma dang po la rmi lam du mthong bar byed do/ /nyi ma gnyis pa la rang nyid mthong bar byed do/ /nyi ma gsum pa la rings par 'ongs shing mdun du 'dug nas 'di skad smra bar byed do/ /bka' ci stsol de nas sgrub pa pos mngag

gzhug gyis shig ces brjod par bya'o/ /rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur zhing rang nyid song nas mi zad pa'i gter ster zhing 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnams smra bar byed do/ /gos dang / rgyan dang / bza' ba bzang po rnams ster bar byed cing lo

nyis stong 'tsho bar byed do/ /de nas pho nya mchog gi sgrub pa'i thabs bshad pa rdo rje 'chang gi khang par song ste/ nag po'i tshes bcu bzhi la khri bzlas nas nyi ma bdun pa la bsgrub pa brtsam par bya ste/ tsan+dan gyi dkyil 'khor bsgrub par byas nas gu gul gyi bdug pa

sbyin zhing me tog dkar po dang / 'bras can dkar po dang / mar dang 'o thug sbyin zhing ku sha'i khri la 'dug ste/ mar gyi mar me rab tu sbar nas mtshan mo ci srid nam phyed kyi bar du bzlas na mngag gzhug mchog rang nyid 'ong ste/ 'ongs pa la tsan+dan gyi mchod yon byin na/ kye sgrub pa

po bdag gis ci bya zhes smra bar byed do/ /de nas sgrub pa pos bdag gi mngag gzhug gyis shig ces bsgo na de phan chad mngag gzhug par 'gyur zhing lhas mngon par 'dod pa'i bza' ba ster ro/ /dngul chu dang bcud kyis len ster zhing gter rnyed par byed la rgyab tu zhon na mtho ris

su yang 'khyer bar byed cing gzhan yang rgyal srid ster bar byed do/ /'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ mngag gzhug sgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i le'u'o// //de nas 'dir yang dag par bshad pa ni dngos grub sna tshogs sgrub par byed pa slob dpon rnams

la phan pa'i don du ji ltar gsungs pa mngag gzhug pa'i thabs te/ bsten par bya ba ma yin pa'i le lo can dang sdig pa byed pa dang / du smra ba dang / tshul 'chos can dang / dbul po dang / nad kyis gdungs pa dang / tshe thung ba dang sems mi brtan pa'i mi rnams kyang spang bar

mi bya ste/ gal te longs spyod dang nor dang grags pa 'dod na yang skad cig gis phun sum tshogs par ster ro/ /sngags 'dis dngul chu dang / bcud kyis len pa'i dngos grub dang / lha'i rgyal srid kyi dngos grub kyang grub par byed na mi rnams kyi rgyal srid grub par byed pa lta smos kyang

ci dgos te/ de bzhin du 'di lha'i bu mo thams cad skad cig tsam gyis grub par byed do/ /gsang sngags 'di ni bklags pas grub par byed cing shin tu brtson 'grus dman pa rnams la yang ci ltar bde ba ltar myur du grub par byed cing sems can thams cad la bde ba rab tu sbyin pa yi ge

bzhi po cher gsang ba/ dngos grub thams cad ster bar byed pa bklags pa tsam gyis mngon par grub par byed pa ste/ 'di la the tshom mi bya'o/ /'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud chen po las dngos grub kyi bsgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i le'u'o// //de nas 'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud chen po las 'byung

po brgyad kyi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid bshad pa/ sor mo rnams phan tshun 'khyud de/ gung mo brkyang nas khab ltar bzung ba ni 'byung po chen po gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /phyag rgya 'di nyid gung mo bkug cing mdzub mo brkyang nas bkug pa ni rgyal ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /phyag rgya 'di nyid las

mdzub mo g.yon pa bskyil zhing mthe'u chung brkyang ste/ so sor bzung ba ni rdzogs byed kyi phyag rgya'o/ /sor mo phan tshun 'khyud de bzung ba ni kun tu rdzogs par byed pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe'u chung dang mthe bo nang du bkug ste bzung ba ni dur khrod kyi bdag po'i phyag rgya'o/ /

mthe'u chung gnyis rab tu brkyang ste bzung ba ni rigs kyi dbang phyug gi phyag rgya'o/ /thal mo sbyar te mdzub mo gnyis bkug pa ni pho nya mchog gi phyag rgya'o/ /'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ 'byung po'i rgyal po chen po brgyad kyi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid rdzogs so// //

de nas gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rdo rje slob dpon la phan pa'i don du bsnyen bkur ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs dpal chen po zhes bya ba'i 'byung mo rdo rje slob dpon gyis bsgrub par bya ste/ 'byung mo rnams kyis ni yid la dga' ba skyed

cing phan tshun tshim par byed pa'o/ /de nas 'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud chen po las 'byung mo dpal chen mo'i sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga rgyas par bshad pa/ dpal khro bo'i bdag po bcom ldan 'das kyi mdun du 'bum bzlas na sngon du bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas zla ba nya la ci ltar

'byor pa'i mchod pa byas te/ gu gul gyi bdug pa sbyin zhing mtshan thog thag bzlas so/ /de nas tho rangs nges par 'ong ngo / /'ongs pa la tsan+dan gyi mchod yon sbyin zhing legs par 'ongs so zhes brjod na kye sgrub pa po ci bka' stsal ces smra'o/ /sgrub pa pos bdag gi chung ma gyis

shig ces brjod na lha'i dngul chu dang / bcud kyis len ster zhing dngos grub kyi rdzas dang gter dang / rgyal srid rnams ster bar byed do/ /zhi ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga rgyas pa dang po'o// //de nas gzhan yang nan tur gyis sgrub pa'i thabs bshad pa/

gro ba'i 'dab ma la 'byung mo dpal chen mo bris te/ mtshan mo gcer bur gyur pas/ dpal rdo rje 'chang gi mdun du stong phrag brgyad bzlas na myur du 'ong ngo / /'ongs pa la chags pa byas na dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten gsum gyi rgyal srid kyang ster bar byed do/ /brgya byin nyid kyang

ster ro/ /rgyab tu zhon na mtho ris su yang 'khyer zhing lo khri 'tsho'o/ /gal te ma grub na mig dang spyi bo 'gas shing skams te skad cig de nyid la 'chi'o/ /zhes khro bo nyid kyis gsungs so/ /gur gum gyis ming bris te rkang pa g.yon pas man nas rdo rje gsor zhing yi ge hU~M hU~M phaT phaT

lan bdun brjod na brjod par gyur pas nges par skad cig gis 'chi bar byed do/ /'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga rgyas pa'o// //gu gul gyi bdug pa sbyin zhing gtor ma bshams te ras dkar pos bkab la/ sngags

'di lan gsum brjod do/ /de ba sa~M b+hU ta ma hi ta/ pra Ni pa tA ya/ bi ba dza yed pr-i thag pr-i thag ma hA b+hU ta/ swa s+thA na ma/ ta tra gats+tsha tish+ma shA ni de ba A la ye Shu na dI ta te/ tsa tu Shu the/ e ka ling ge wa de ba A ya ta nai wa/ shrI g+h+ra~M gats+tsha tu/ b+hu ta nA ma sa ma ya pra ti pA la nu ya/ ya ti sa i ban gats+tsha

ti ta k+She Na mur d+ha ni/ su la yed/ b+hU tA nAM rai ra wa~M na ra kaM pa ted/ ya tha ya tha/ swa s+thA ne gats+tsha tu/ ya thA su khI swA hA/ rdo rje slob dpon gyis lha rnams nye bar bsdu bar bya'o/ /'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ rim par phye ba gnyis pa rdzogs te/

'byung po 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud stong phrag bcu drug pa las ji snyed pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po bud+d+ha A ka ra ba rma dang / lo ts+tsha ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// //

@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya nI lAM bar d+ha ra badzra pA Ni kalpa nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi cho ga zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can sangs

rgyas gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis rjes su gnang ba/ mche ba gtsigs pa dang 'tsham pa/ mig me mdag gi phung po 'dra ba/ dbugs me lce ltar 'bar ba/ 'jigs pa'i nga ro can/ lag pa dang rkang pa klu nor rgyas kyi bus brgyan pa/ klu nag po se ral khar thogs pa/ klu

dga' bo dang nye dga' bo 'bar bas rna cha byas pa/ sbrul 'bar ba rin po che'i cod pan thogs pa/ sbrul gdug pa 'bar ba za ba/ bzhin rgyas pa/ smin ma dang dpral ba bsdus pa/ ya sos ma mchu mnan pa/ gshin rje'i cha byad can/ lce glog ltar 'gyu ba gsus po che sbrul

za ba/ lag pa brdabs pa'i sgras 'jigs par byed pa/ klu'i rgyal po 'dab ska rags su bcings pa/ a la la zhes sgrogs par byed pa/ rgya mtsho'i zabs su dpag tshad brgyad khri yod pas rkang pa'i pus mor phyin pa dbang po dang nyi ma phrag pa la khur ba/ klu thams

cad rlag par byed pa gad rgyangs chen po dgod pas kun tu 'khrugs par byed pa/ gshin rje'i gzugs can khams gsum pa 'jigs par byed pa klu rnams 'ching bar byed pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis gsungs pa'i

rig sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/ /tad+ya thA/ b+ho b+ho bAn+nAgAd+hi pa ta ye/ i daM nI lAM bar d+ha ra sha rI raM/ badzra pA Ni hr-i da yaM yaH/ sa mA ti kra ma tha/ ut+sA da naM b+ha bi Sh+ya ti/ ta d+ya thA/ bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/ bi bud+d+ha bi bud+d+ha/ ma hi prAp+ta/ ha ra ha ra nA gA nAM/ pra ha ra pra ha ra nA gA nAM/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+danAg hr-i da

yA ni/ b+hin+da b+hin+da nA ga marmA Ni/ b+hi sIr+ya n+tu nAg sha rI rA Ni/ bi s+pho Ta ya/ nAg na ya nA ni/ ta d+ya thA hU~M phaT/ nAg bi dA ra NA ya phaT/ nA got+sA da NA ya phaT/ nI lAM ba sa nA ya phaT/ a pra ti ha ta ba la pa rA kra mA ya phaT/ kr-i tAn+ta ya phaT/ kr-i tAn+ta rU phA ya phaT/ ro ShaNA ya phaT/ trA sa nA

ya phaT/ kum+b+hAN+DotasA da n+da ya phaT/ pre ta pi shA tsi bi nA sha ka rA ya phaT/ yak+ShA pasmAr bi nA sa ka rA ya phaT/ ha sa ha sa/ dA ra dA ra/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ nA sha ya nA sha ya/ sarba big+h+naM bi nA sha ka rA ya phaT/ sarba shatrUM saM g+ha bi nA sha ka rA ya phaT/ o~M nI wAM bar d+ha ra badzra pA Ni

rAdz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ de'i cho ga la gnod sbyin gyis zin pa la chu la sngags kyis btab ste gtor na btang bar 'gyur ro/ /klu bzlog par 'dod na smyag shad kyi lcug ma'am bal po'i se'u'i lcug mas bya'o/ /dang brjed byed rnams la skud pas bya'o/ /rims nad med par bya ba

dang / gzhogs phyed na ba dang yig 'chus pa la ni skud pa sngon pos bya'o/ /nor 'dod na zhag gcig smyung bar 'dug ste spos phor gyis bdugs na rmi lam du dge ba dang mi dge ba'i don thams cad ston la gser gyi dong tse bdun stong sbyin par byed do/ /rgyas btab pa dgrol bar 'dod

na thal bas bya'o/ /sgo lcags dbye bar 'dod na yungs kar gyis bya'o/ /'jigs pa thams cad bsrung ba la ni mar rnying pa'am thal ba'am/ yungs kar gyis bya'o/ /nad kyi 'jigs pa thams cad la ni skud pa sngon po la bsrung ba'i mdud pa byas te mgul du btags na

bsrung ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro/ /byis pa gdon gyis nyen pa la ni tshon sna lnga'i skud pa la bsrung ba'i mdud pa byas te mgul du btags na bsrung ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro/ /chom rkun bzlog par 'dod na sas bya'o/ /dug la ni rtswa ku shas byab par bya'o/ /bdag bsrung ba la ni yid

kyis sam chus bya'o/ /gzhan bsrung ba la ni skud pa sngon pos bya'o/ /las de dag thams cad la sngags brjod pa ni lan gsum mam/ bdun nam/ bcu bzhi'am/ nyi shu rtsa gcig gam/ brgya rtsa brgyad brjod par bya'o/ /de ltar byas na 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /

mchod rten sku gdung dang ldan pa'i drung du me tog sngon pos mchod de/ sngags stong bzlas brjod byas na 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi cho ga zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na dang /

bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba rgya brtson 'grus seng ges dpal na lan da'i sgo 'gram du bsgyur// @##/ /'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mtshan brgyad pa gsang sngags dang bcas pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas byang

chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'khor gyi nang nas langs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams kyi don gyi slad du rig pa mchog

gi cho ga rgyas pa chen po gsang ba dang bcas pa/ gsang chen dang bcas pa bdag gis bshad lags kyis/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du mchis la sems can rnams gdul bar 'tshal lo/ /de skad ces gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba'i bdag po

lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /lag na rdo rje gang khyod kyis rig pa mchog gi cho ga rgyas pa chen po 'di bshad pa ni/ khyod gtum pa yin bsten par dka' ba yin/ shin tu thub par dka' ba yin/ 'phags pa'i tshul med pa yin te/ lag na rdo rje khyod kyis rig

pa mchog gi cho ga rgyas pa chen po bshad pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni gsang ba med par las mi byed do/ /lag na rdo rje de bas na rdo rje'i rigs 'di dang / rig pa mchog gi cho ga rgyas pa chen po 'di bde blag tu 'grub par bya ba'i phyir khyod kyi ming brgyad pa gsang ba gsang

sngags kyi 'khor dang bcas pa gang thos na mtshams med pa lnga byed pa yang sdig pa 'byang bar 'gyur ba dang / lag na rdo rje khyod kyang mthong bar 'gyur ba dang / bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad kyang 'byer bar 'gyur ba dang / log 'dren bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad

cu rtsa bzhi rnams kyang phyogs bcur 'byer bar 'gyur ba dang / gang thos na tshangs par ma spyad pa yang tshangs par spyad par 'gyur ba dang / thub par ma byas pa yang thub par byas par 'gyur ba dang / smyung bar ma byas pa yang smyung ba byas par 'gyur ba dang / dge sbyong ma yin pa

yang dge sbyong gi 'bras bu dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang de la srung bar mdzad pa dang / las kyi dngos grub kyang stsol bar 'gyur ba bshad par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das

kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gi ming brgyad pa gsang ba gsang sngags kyi 'khor dang bcas pa rnams gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje ngas bshad kyis

nyon cig /'di lta ste/ khyod ni glang po che'i rna ba can yin/ khyod ni rgyan bzang po dang ldan pa yin/ /khyod ni rnam par gnon pa yin/ khyod ni rin po che'i 'byung gnas yin/ khyod ni bden pa nyid yin/ khyod ni gzugs sdug pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa yin/ khyod ni 'bar ba'i

me lce dang ldan pa yin/ khyod ni gzugs mdzes pa yin no/ /khyod kyi ming 'di dag mkhas pa dag gis thos na/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bdun gyi bar du sems can dmyal bar skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang

de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe mdun na bzhugs shing de dag de la chos ston par mdzad do/ /chos bstan pa des na de dag dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang thabs cig tu gnas par 'gyur ro/ /na mo bud+d+ha s+ya/ na

mo d+harma s+ya/ namaHso~M g+ha s+ya/ na mo badzra pA Ni s+ya/ ta d+ya thA/ aT+Te/ aT+Te/ kha raT+Te/ so me so mA su khi/ hi ri hi ri/ mi ri ki ri/ b+hi ri bi sa ni sid+d+h+yan tu/ sarba kAr+yA Ni/ sA d+ha ya man+t+ra pa da swA hA/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes bcom

ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so/ /'di ltar gsang ba chen po bka' stsal pa gang lags pa de ni legs te/ bcom ldan 'das de de lags so/ /de de lags te/ bcom ldan 'das rig pa mchog sgrub pa ni

bzlas brjod bgyid pa dang / sgrub pa'i tshe mchod pa bgyis la ming brgyad pa bklag par bgyi'o/ /bklags nas bdag bstod par 'gyur te/ dga' nas dngos grub stsal bar 'tshal lo/ /bgegs kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur la/ lha rnams kyang dga' nas myur du dngos grub stsol bar

bgyid do/ /nyal ba'i tshe bklags na rmi lam ngan pa mthong bar mi 'gyur/ sku gdung dang ldan pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du lan 'bum du bzlas brjod bgyis na sdig pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro/ /mtshams med pa lnga bgyid pa yang bskal pa bzang por byang chub sems dpar

'gyur ro zhes bdag mchi'o/ /yang lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyis na slob dpon du 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rje'i mtshan brgyad pa gsang sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so// @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ badzra bi dA ra NA nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ rdo

rjes rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje la bzhugs te/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus lag na rdo rjes lus thams cad rdo rjer byin gyis

brlabs nas rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /de nas lag na rdo rje sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs kyis rdo rje khro bo las byung ba rdo rje snying pos rab tu smras te/ mi thub

pa/ mi chod pa/ mi shigs pa/ bden pa/ sra ba/ brtan pa/ thams cad du thogs pa med pa/ thams cad du ma pham pa/ sems can thams cad skrag par byed pa/ sems can thams cad 'jil bar byed pa/ rig sngags thams cad gcod par byed pa/ rig sngags

thams cad gnon par byed pa/ las thams cad 'joms par byed pa/ gzhan gyi las thams cad 'jig par byed pa/ gdon thams cad rlag par byed pa/ gdon thams cad las thar bar byed pa/ 'byung po thams cad 'gugs par byed pa/ 'byung po thams cad tshar

gcod pa/ rig sngags kyi las thams cad byed du 'jug pa/ ma grub pa rnams grub par byed pa/ grub pa rnams chud mi za bar byed pa/ 'dod pa thams cad rab tu sbyin pa/ sems can thams cad bsrung ba/ zhi ba/ rgyas pa/ sems can thams cad

rengs par byed pa/ rmugs par byed pa'i gsang sngags kyi mthu chen po 'di sangs rgyas kyi mthus lag na rdo rjes rab tu smras so/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mash+tsaN+Da badzra pA Na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ ta d+ya thA/ o~M tru Ta tru Ta/ /tro Ta ya tro Ta ya/ s+phu Ta s+phu Ta/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta

ya/ g+hUr+N+Na g+hUr+N+Na/ g+hUr+N+Na pa ya g+hUr+N+Na pa ya/ sarba satwA ni/ bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/ saM bo d+ha ya saM bo d+ha ya/ b+h+ra ma b+h+ra ma/ saM b+h+rA ma ya saM b+h+rA ma ya/ sarba b+hU tA ni/ ku Ta ku Ta/ saM ku Ta ya saM ku Ta ya/ sarba sha trUn/ g+ha Ta g+ha Ta/ /saM g+ha Ta ya saM g+ha Ta ya/ sarba bid+yA badzra badzra/ s+pho Ta ya badzra badzra/

ka Ta badzra badzra/ ma Ta badzra badzra/ ma tha badzra badzra/ aT+Ta hA sa nI la badzra/ su badzrA ya swA hA/ he phul+lu/ ni ru phul+lu/ ni gr-ih+Na kul+lu/ mi li tsul+lu/ ku ru kul+lu/ badzra bi dza yA ya swA hA/ kI li kI lA ya swA hA/ ka Ta ka Ta/ ma Ta ma Ta/ ra Ta ra Ta/ mo Ta na pra mo Ta nA ya swA hA/ tsa ra ni tsa

ra/ ha ra ha ra/ sa ra sa ra/ mA ra ya/ badzra bi dA rA ya swA hA/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ b+hin+da b+hin+da/ ma hA kI li kI lA ya swA hA/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ kro d+ha kro d+ha/ kI li kI lA ya swA hA/ tsu ru tsu ru tsaN+Da la kI li kI lA ya swA hA/ trA sa ya trA sa ya/ badzra kI li kI lA ya swA hA/ ha ra ha ra badzra d+ha rA ya swA hA/

pra ha ra pra ha ra/ badzra pra b+hany+dza nA ya swA hA/ ma ti s+thi ra badzra/ shru ti s+thi ra badzra/ pra ti s+thi ra badzra/ ma hA badzra/ a pra ti ha ta badzra/ a mo g+ha badzra/ e hi badzra/ shI g+haMbadzrA ya swA hA/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ sarba badzra ku la mA brta ya swA hA/ a mu kaM mA ra ya phaT/ na

mas+saman+ta badzrA nA~M/ sarba ba la~M A bar+t+ta ya/ ma hA ba le/ ka Ta be/ ta ta le/ a tsa le/ maN+Dal mA ye/ a ti badzra/ ma hA ba le/ be ga ra Na/ a dzi te/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ ti Ti ti Ti/ ting+ga le/ da ha da ha/ te dzo ba ti/ ti li ti li/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ ma hA ba le/ badzrAMku sha dz+wa la ya swA

hA/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mash+tsaN+Da badzra pA Na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ ta d+ya tha/ o~M ha ra ha ra badzra/ ma tha ma tha badzra/ d+hu na d+hu na badzra/ da ha da ha badzra/ pa tsa pa tsa badzra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra badzra/ d+hA ra ya d+hA ra ya badzra/ dA ru Na dA ru Na badzra/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da badzra/ b+hin+da b+hin+da badzra hU~M phaT/ na mash+tsaN+Da badzra kro

d+hA ya/ hu lu hu lu/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ ha na ha na/ a mr-i te hU~M phaT/ sdig pa thams cad byang byas nas/ /sdug bsngal thams cad med par byed/ /rgyud do cog gi rtsa ba ste/ /dpal kun gyis ni legs par brgyan/ /sems can dbang po nyams pa dang / /tshe zad pa dang tshe nyams

dang / /phun sum tshogs min gang chags dang / /lha rnams rgyab kyis phyogs pa dang / /mdza' sdug skye bo sdang ba dang / /bran bza' la sogs gtses pa dang / /phan tshun mthun pa ma yin dang / /nor 'gribs pas ni gnod pa dang / /mya ngan ngal las gnod pa dang / /'jigs pa

dang ni phongs pa dang / /gza' dang rgyu skar byad stems dang / /mi bzad gdon gyis nyen pa dang / /mya ngan ngal las byung ba yi/ /rmi lam sdig pa mthong na yang / /des ni rab bkrus gtsang ma yin/ /mdo sde dam pa mnyan par bya/ /gang dag yid dge sems dang zhing / /gtsang ma'i

gos kyis rab brgyan te/ /zab mo sangs rgyas spyod yul ba/ /mdo sde 'di ni nyan byed na/ /mdo sde 'di yi gzi brjid kyis/ /srog chags dag ni thams cad kyi/ /mi bzad pa yi nad rnams kyang / /de dag thams cad zhi bar blta/ /tshe dang bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur/ /

sdig pa kun las rnam par grol/ /nor bu yungs kar dUr ba dang / /rin chen rma med tsan+dan bcas/ /shel dang rdo rje me tog dang / /chu yis gser ram yang na ni/ /dngul gyi bum pa dag kyang rung / /gtsang ma'i gos kyis dkri zhing dgang / /lan grangs nyi shu rtsa gcig gam/ /yang na lan grangs

brgya rtsa brgyad/ /rdo rje rnam 'joms bzlas nas ni/ /rgyal po rtag tu khrus gyis shig /rdo rjes rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// //

@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ma hA badzra me ru shi khar kU Ta gA ra d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rdo rje'i ri rab chen po'i rtse mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus

gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i lhun po chen po'i rtse mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa rdo rje chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sa'i gnas rdo rje chen po'i dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pas legs par brgyan pa/ rdo rje chen po'i rdzing gi rin po che'i pad+ma'i 'od kyis snang bar byas pa/ sa phyogs rdo rje chen po'i bye ma

bdal ba/ rdo rje chen por byin gyis brlabs pa/ 'khor gyi khyams rdo rje chen po las byas pa/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi rdo rje chen po'i seng ge'i khri bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag stong gis rnam par mdzes pa/ chos bstan pa dang / cho 'phrul can/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin

gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis nges par 'byung ba na/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi thams cad kyang skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par

rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa/ mthu chen po thob pa/ rdo rje chen po'i rnam par thar pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par 'phrul ba dang / cho 'phrul chen po kun du ston pa/ sems kyi skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig la sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod

pa'i rjes su 'jug pa'i chos bstan pa sna tshogs mnyam pa nyid snyan cing rgya che la zab pa dang / spobs pa dang / cho 'phrul dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa chen po'i sprin gyis mchod pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo dang / gzungs dang / ting

nge 'dzin dang / dbang dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ma 'dres pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / sa bcu dang / pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po dang / byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms

dang / byams pa'i stobs dang / dben pa dang / yongs su byang ba'i sems kyi rgyun dang ldan pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying po zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje'i mig dang / rdo rje'i lus dang / rdo rje blo gros dang / lag na rdo rje dang / rdo rje 'dus

pa dang / rdo rje mthu bo che dang / rdo rje rnam par 'phrul ba dang / rdo rje brtsegs pa dang / rdo rje phung po dang / rdo rje nga ro dang / rdo rje bzang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje tog ces bya ba dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag

brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dang / nyan thos chen po rab tu mang po thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba chad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs dang / cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pas/ rnam par 'phrul ba'i

mthu chen po thob pa/ lta ba chags pa med pa/ thams cad kyang dri ma dang bral ba/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyi sa bon nges par bsregs pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa ka pin dang /

tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang / tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan paskul byed dang / tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed dang / tshe dang ldan pa ga yA 'od srung dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung dang / de dag la sogs pa nyan

thos chen po rab tu mang po dang / lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu grangs med dpag tu med pa gzhal du med pa dag dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha'i bu tshangs pa bzang po la sogs pa tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang /

lha'i bu rab 'thab bral g.yog 'thab bral gyi lha'i ris kyi lha'i bu dang bcas pa dang / yongs su dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin lha'i bu thams cad kyi 'khor can dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags zangs

ris dang / stobs can dang / rab sim dang / sgra gcan dang / rnam par snang byed dang / de dag la sogs pa lha ma yin gyi dbang po tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / ma dros pa dang / 'jog po dang / nor rgyas kyi bu dang /

dungaskyong dang / stobs kyi rgyu dang / pad+ma dang / pad+ma chen po dang / mtha' yas dang / de dag la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa dag dang / mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa mi'am ci'i rgyal po'i g.yog du ma can dang / dri za'i rgyal po gtsug phud lnga pa dri za'i rgyal

po'i g.yog du ma can dang / rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po don thams cad grub pa rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po'i g.yog du ma can dang / nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po gser mig nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po'i g.yog du ma can dang / gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / nor bu

bzang dang / gang ba bzang dang / gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po lngas rtsen gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po'i g.yog du ma can dang / 'phrog ma bu lnga brgya'i g.yog can dang / 'jig rten gyi ma bdun dang / sring mo chen mo bdun dang / drang srong chen po bdun dang / bar snang la rgyu ba'i rgyu skar dang /

gza'i lha thams cad dang / phyogs kyi lha rnams dang / phyogs mtshams kyi lha rnams dang / sa'i lha dang / dbyangs can dang / 'byung po rnams dang / bgegs rnams dang / log 'dren rnams dang / dang / 'byung po rdzu 'phrul chen po rnams dang / ri'i rgyal po thams

cad dang / 'jig rten skyong ba chu lha g.yog rgya mtsho'i lha thams cad dang bcas pa dang / 'phags skyes po dang / mig mi bzang dang / lag na be con dang / bden bral dang / me'i lha dang / rlung gi lha chen po bdun dang / dbang bdag chung ma dang bcas pa tshogs bye ba khrag khrig 'bum

phrag du ma'i 'khor can dang / sred med kyi bu g.yog dang bcas pa dang / byin pa po dang / phreng ba can dang / lcags can dang / tshogs kyi bdag po chen po dang / sprin ta la dang / log 'dren dbang po bgegs log 'dren gyi g.yog du ma can dang / shing gseb kyi lha drug cu

dang / sring mo bzhi ming po dang bcas pa dang / ma bdun dang / rdo rje lcags kyu can dang / rdo rje lu gu rgyud dang / rdo rje pho nya mo drug cu rtsa bzhi dang / rdo rje'i sde dang / lag dang / gtsug gis 'gro dang / rdo rje'i rigs kyi 'khor du ma dang bcas pa dang / de ma yin pa

gzhan yang sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la mngon par dad pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / 'byung po dang / dang / sha za dang / smyo byed dang

brjed byed dang / sgrub pa dang / sbrul 'dzin bcas dang / gnon po tshad med dpag tu med grangs med pa rnams dang / lha'i bu nyi ma dang / lha'i bu zla ba dang / dus tshigs kyi lha dang / nub ka'i lha dang / dus kyi lha thams cad dang / gnam sa'i lha thams cad dang yang thabs cig go/ /

de ltar yang bcom ldan 'das de chos kyi 'khor lo ni shin tu bskor/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa ni shin tu yongs su mthar phyin/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs ni shin tu yongs su rdzogs/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / byang chub chen po dang / pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sa ni brnyes

pas ni shin tu yongs su bzung / skyes bu chen po'i mtshan mnga' ba sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis ni sku brgyan/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus ni yan lag dang nying lag thams cad rnam par spras/ spyi gtsug ni sems can thams cad kyis ltar mi mthong / bdud kyi tsher ma thams cad ni dkrugs/

de kho na nyid mkhyen pa nyid ni rim par thugs su chud/ spyan rnam pa lnga ni mnga'/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i mchog dang ni ldan/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ni ldan/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang ni ldan/ bdud dang phas kyi rgol pa dang / ngan pa'i tshogs can

gyi tshogs thams cad ni bcom/ brjod pa'i sgra dang / tshigs su bcad pa ni 'phags/ khyu mchog dang / seng ge'i sgra ni sgrog /ma rig pa'i mun pa ni kun du bsal/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med dpag tu med par sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang /

bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / thabs dang / stobs dang / smon lam dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / dka' ba spyad pas mngon par grub pa'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad

bzang po brgyad cus sku brgyan pas ni mdzes shing rin po che rdo rje'i pad+ma'i snying po'i seng ge'i khri la ni bzhugs te/ gdan rin po che dang / rdo rje'i pad+ma'i seng ge'i khri ri rab tsam rdo rje dang / rin po che dang / mu tig dang ldan pa'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba du ma sil sil sgra 'byung ba/ rdo rje dang

rin po che du ma'i stegs bu la rtsa ba legs par brtan pa/ rdo rje dang rin po che du ma'i chu srin gyi kha nas byung ba'i mu tig dmar po'i phreng ba dang ldan pa'i snam rten dang bcas pa/ rin po che du ma'i pad+ma'i snying po la chags pa'i rin po che ke ke ru dang / ke ke ru chen po dang / an da rnyil dang /

mthon ka chen po dang / dun las du ma'i 'od zer 'bar bas snang bar gyur pas kun nas mdzes pa/ rin po che dang rdo rje'i thur mas brgyan pa'i gdugs yu bas bstod pa/ bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas grib mar bsgribs shing bskyabs pa/ dpag bsam gyi shing du mas mdzes

par byas pa rgya che ba la bzhugs te/ gser gyi ri bo ltar dpal gyis 'bar ba/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'byor pas sa phyogs mdzes par gyur pa/ zla ba nya ltar 'jig rten kun gyis mthong na dga' ba/ dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa chen po ltar sangs rgyas kyi

chos rnams kyis yang dag par rgyas pa chos ston te/ tshangs par spyod pa/ thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa dang / yongs su dkar ba yang dag par ston to/ /de nas bcom ldan

'das kyi spyi gtsug gi mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kun du ston pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer gyi dra ba chen po byung ste/ 'od zer gyi dra ba des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang bas gsal bar byas par gyur to/ /gang gA'i klung gi bye ma

ji snyed pa dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyang snang ba des gsal bar snang bar gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa de dag kyang seng ge'i khri du ma bkod pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gzhal med khang rnams na chos ston to/ /

nyan thos chen po de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag dang thabs cig go/ /dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am

ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams dang yang thabs cig go/ /de dag thams cad kyang rdo rje'i lhun po chen po'i rtse mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gzungs yang dag par rab tu ston to/ /de dag thams cad kyang kun du snang ngo / /skad cig de la sems can de dag thams cad bde ba thams cad kyis tshim par

gyur to/ /'on pa rnams ni sgra thos so/ /long ba rnams ni mig thob bo/ /smyon pa rnams ni dran pa rnyed do/ /nad pa rnams ni sos par gyur to/ /sbrum ma rnams ni bde bar btsas so/ /sems can dmyal ba thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rnams ni med par gyur to/ /yud tsam de la

dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / kyi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnams kyi ming yang mi grag par gyur to/ /'jig rten gyi bar gang dag mun pa mun nag dang / mun pa mun nag chen por 'dug pa de dag thams cad kyang gsal bar snang bar gyur to/ /der sems can gang dag

skyes pa de dag thams cad dang / sems can gzhan 'dir skyes pa rnams kyang gcig gis gcig shes so/ /de nas sems can de dag thams cad kyi ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi dga' ba thob ste bde ba mchog gis tshim par gyur nas kun du bltas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra

bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong ste/ de dag gis gser gyi mchod sdong ltar dpal gyis 'bar zhing rang gi gzi brjid kyis mngon par 'phags pa de mthong nas de nyid la skyabs su dong ngo / /skyabs su dong ma thag tu de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor

gyi dkyil 'khor de nyid du bdag son pa snyam du shes so/ /snang ba des bdud kyi khyim thams cad kun du 'bar rab tu 'bar kun du rab tu mched cing 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur par kun du snang ngo / /bdud kyi ris kyi lha de dag kyang skad cig de la nyam thag pa'i sgrar ngu zhing skrag nas byer

ro/ /bdud sdig can yang bzhin bzang po rnyi rnyi por gyur cing lus rngul nas bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu thams cad la smras pa/ grogs po dag bdud kyi khyim thams cad kun du 'bar rab tu 'bar kun du rab tu mched cing 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur pa dang / dge sbyong gau ta ma ri rab kyi rtse mo'i

khang pa brtsegs pa na chos bstan pa 'di la ltos/ des bdag cag phang ngo / /mtho btsams so/ /phyogs gang na gnas su gtol med do/ /longs la dge sbyong gau tam de'i gan du dong ste/ bdud kyi yul 'di thal bar byas par ma gyur gyi bar du gzhom mo/ /de skad ces smras

pa dang / bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu de dag thams cad kyis rje bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes smras nas/ rang rang gi gnas su dong ste/ lag na mtshon cha sna tshogs can/ lus la go cha sna tshogs pa/ cha byad dang / rgyan sna tshogs can/ mche ba mi bzad par 'jigs su rung ba/ bzhin

mi sdug par bsgyur ba/ mig dang bzhin dang / skra kun du 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar ba dag skad cig de nyid la gcig tu 'dus nas bdud sdig can ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bzhengs bzhengs thog mar bzhud la ji tsam du dge sbyong gau ta

ma nyan thos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang bcas pa de ci nas kyang phyis bdag cag gi yul du gnod pa cung zad kyang mi skyed pa dang / bdag cag gi yul gnod par mi 'gyur bar deng nyid du phye mar brlag go/ /rnam par gzhom mo/ /de nas bdud sdig can dga'

zhing mgu ste shin tu dga' bas spu'i khung bu khyab nas skad cig de nyid la bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu thams cad dang lhan cig tu bdud kyi rnam par 'phrul ba chen po dang / bdud kyi sde chen pos bar snang dpag tshad stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhir khyab par byas te/ dung dang / rnga dang / rdza rnga dang /

'khar rnga dang / rgyud gcig pa dang / lcags kyi sil da krol dang / rnga bo che rdung zhing hu hu zhes bya ba dang / bi tsi zhes bya ba dang / zung shig zung shig /sod cig sod cig ces bya ba'i sgra 'byin cing gshol dang / gtun shing dang / gtun rked nyag pa dang / phur bu dang / rdo rje

rtse gcig pa dang / mda' bo che dang / mdung thung dang / rtse gsum pa dang / ral gri dang / 'khor lo dang / gzhu dang / mda' la sogs pa'i mtshon cha lag na thogs shing bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/ skad cig de nyid la a la la zhes bya ba'i sgra phyung nas/ bcom ldan 'das

la mtshon cha thams cad kyi char phab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mthus mtshon cha de dag thams cad me tog gi gdugs kyi sprin chen por gyur par snang ngo / /bdud kyi sgra de dag thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra dang / yang dag par bgro ba'i sgra rnams su grag

go/ /bdud sdig can ni zhags pa lnga'i bcings pas bdag nyid bcings par mthong ngo / /de nas bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul ngo mtshar chen po de mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur cing dga' ba thob ste/ bcom ldan 'das de nyid la skyabs

su dong ngo / /bdud sdig can ni bdag nyid dgrol bar 'dod na 'grol ma nus te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi khyams su bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar shing rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du rdo rje 'khor gyi khyams chen por 'gyel to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe byams pa chen

po'i thugs dang / thugs rje chen pos brlan pa'i spyan gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi khyams thams cad du gzigs nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje bdud sdig can 'di 'khor gyi khyams 'di nas

slong la stan la zhog ste/ rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul ba'i ba'i byin gyis brlabs bsam gyis mi khyab par bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'joms par byed pa zhes pa gang gis bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu 'di dag dang / bdud sdig can 'di sangs rgyas

la skyabs su 'dong ba dang / gzhan yang gang dag sdang ba bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / dang / brjed byed dang / 'byung po dang / gdon dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / sgrub pa dang / sbrul 'dzin bcas dang / gnon po dang / zas su btsas pa za

ba la sogs pa sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ rab tu sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la ma gus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid khong du ma chud pa de dag thams cad gang gis 'dzud pa dang / dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro bar byed pa

yang ston cig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ des ngan 'gro log par ltung bar 'gro ba'i phyir ro/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' mnyan nas/ rin po che'i pad+ma'i rdo rje'i stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar

nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po la bzhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ /sems can kun gyi nyon mongs pa/ /gzhag

pa'i slad du 'dren par byung / /khyod ni bdud rnams kun las rgyal/ /'jig rten rtsa lag gcig pu khyod/ /thar pa'i grong khyer 'jug pa'i lam/ /ye shes ma lus khyod gcig pus/ /yang dag brnyes nas thugs rje yis/ /brlan pa'i thugs kyis bstan pa mdzad/ /khyod sngon

sbyin dang tshul khrims dang / /bzod dang brtson 'grus bsam gtan dang / /shes rab la sogs yon tan gyis/ /bdag mdzad slad kyis sems can btsud/ /khyod kyis chos rnams skye med par/ /bshad cing de bzhin rnam phye yang / /'bras bur dogs pa ma mchis pa/ /kye

ma mgon po khyod kyis bshad/ /'khor lo yan lag bcu gnyis pa/ /khyod nyid mkhyen nas rab tu bskor/ /mu stegs can dang bdud btul te/ /chos kyi snang ba gsal bar mdzad/ /nyon mongs brag chen rnam kun du/ /ye shes rdo rjes rab bcom nas/ /sus kyang thob par

ma gyur pa'i/ /byang chub bla na med pa brnyes/ /gang gi mtshan yang rdzogs pa yi/ /byang chub sa bon nyid 'gyur ba/ /khyod ni 'jig rten mchog gcig pu/ /dam pa rab sbyin bdag po lags/ /khyod ni mgon po khyod ni pha/ /khyod skyabs khyod ni dpung gnyen lags/ /thugs rje

chen po ye shes nyid/ /mya ngan 'das nas gcig pu khyod/ /khyod nyid gshegs nas sems can rnams/ /sems can dmyal las rnam par bkrol/ /rang gi sku yang yongs btang nas/ /khyod kyis srog chags rnams kyang bsrungs/ /lus can kun gyis ma thob pa'i/ /ye

shes khyod kyis brnyes gyur nas/ /grol te 'jig rten rnams kyang grol/ /kye ma khyod ni rtsa lag bzang / /mgon po khyod kyi 'od zer gyi/ /dra bas 'jig rten khams khyab ste/ /mya ngan 'das las lhag pa bde/ /lus can kun gyis thob par mdzad/ /khyod kyi 'od kyi

gzis bcom pa/ /gza' rnams kun dang dgung zla dang / /gdugs rnams dang ni zhugs rnams dang / /nor bu lam mer ma gyur to/ /de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas yang

rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po la 'dug ste/ bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol nas rdo rje'i rnam par thar ba'i sgo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'joms par byed pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes rdo rje'i rnam

par thar pa'i sgo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'joms par byed pa zhes bya ba 'di la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ kun du rab tu g.yos te/ shar phyogs mtho na nub phyogs

dma'/ nub phyogs mtho na shar phyogs dma'/ lho phyogs mtho na byang phyogs dma'/ byang phyogs mtho na lho phyogs dma'/ mtha' mtho na dbus dma'/ dbus mtho na mtha' dma' bar gyur to/ /phyogs thams cad dang / phyogs mtshams thams cad kyang dga'

ba dang yid bde ba skyes par gyur nas/ lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i yan lag dang nying lag gi mtshams thams cad nas rdo rje kun du 'bar bar ba tu 'bar ba/ kun du rab tu mched cing 'bar ba/ me lce gcig tu gyur pa

dag byung bar kun du snang ngo / /rdo rje 'bar ba'i snang ba des phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa ji snyed pa dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ tshangs par spyod pa/ thog mar dge

ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba/ yang dag par ston pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang bcas pa

de dag gi 'khor gyi khyams rgya che zhing rgya che bdag na kun du snang ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi spyan snga na rdo rje 'bar ba'i snang ba rgya chen po des snang bar gyur nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la so sor zhus pa/ bcom ldan

'das snang ba rgya chen po kun du gda' ba 'di su'i lags/ de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis so so'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya

thub pa zhes bya ba/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na ri rab kyi steng na chos ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des bdud sdig can zhags pa'i bcing ba lngas bcings te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'gyel ba gzigs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gsang

ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje zhes bya ba la 'di skad du/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje khyod kyis rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul ston cig ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu dag 'di ni rdo rje'i rnam par thar ba'i sgo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/

de'i rdo rje'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen po'i byin gyis brlabs so/ /de skad ces bka' stsal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis gnang nas/ rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs

pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la phyag 'tshal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la mchod pa'i sprin dang / gdugs kyi sprin dang / rgyan phreng gi sprin dang / dbu rgyan gyi sprin dang / me tog gi sprin dang / na bza'i sprin chen pos mchod pa chen po byas nas/ nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khod

bzhin du bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la lan bdun bskor ba byas te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga rin po che'i pad+ma'i rdo rje'i stan la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la logs su lta zhing bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pas gnang nas rang rang gi rin po

che'i pad+ma'i rdo rje'i stan de dag la 'khod par gyur to/ /de'i tshe shar phyogs logs na 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje tog ces bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje'i snying pos rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes te/

'di ltar rdo rje'i ri rab chen po'i rtse mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gzungs 'di nyid las brtsams te chos kyang ston to/ /rdo rje 'bar ba'i snang ba des kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kun nas snang bar gyur to/ /de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa de'i 'khor gyi khyams su 'dus te 'dug par gyur pa des ngo mtshar de mthong nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje'i snying pos rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba de la zhus te/ bcom ldan

'das rdo rje 'bar ba'i snang ba 'di lta bu gang gis 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad snang bar gyur te/ sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun chad cing sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / dang / gshin rje'i 'jig

rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad mi gda' bar gyur/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams na rdzu 'phrul che zhing dbang che bar grags pa thams cad kyang kun nas

mchod pa'i sprin chen pos dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes te/ nub phyogs su mchi bar gda' ba 'di su'i lags/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje'i snying pos rab tu 'joms pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

rdo rje snying po de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu nub phyogs kyi logs na mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar rdo rje chen pa'i ri rab kyi rtse mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa na rdo rje chen po'i ri rab kyi rtse

mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gzungs zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs ston to/ /bcom ldan 'das des spyi gtsug gi mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas 'od zer gyi dra ba chen po phyang ste/ 'od zer gyi dra ba chen po des 'jig rten gyi khams der bdud sdig can bskul ma thag tu kun du khros nas lha'i bu thams

cad dang / gzhan yang bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / dpung gi tshogs chen po dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das de la gtse ba'i phyir lhags pa dang / de yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi khyams de nyid du zhags pa lnga'i bcing bas bcings nas/

bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'gyel te/ de la thugs brtse ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la ston cig par bka' lung byin nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje des rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo chen

po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ yan lag dang nying lag gi mtshams thams cad nas rdo rje rnams bstan te/ 'di ni rdo rje de dag nyid kyi rdo rje 'bar ba'i snang ba'o/ /rigs kyi bu rdo rje 'bar ba'i snang ba des kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med dpag tu

med pa rnams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa ji snyed pa snang bar byas te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang bskul/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag kyang

bskul bas ngo mtshar thob par gyur pa dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la yang so sor zhus so/ /rigs kyi bu de nyid kyi mthus bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa

de'i spyan snga na 'dug cing bsnyen bkur byed pa yang mthong ngo / /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje'i snying pos rab tu 'joms pa de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying pos 'di skad ces

gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje de yang blta bar bgyi

ba'i slad du mchi'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje'i snying pos rab tu 'joms pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu de'i dus

la dbab par shes na song shig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje'i snying pos rab tu 'joms pa de la lan bdun

bskor ba byas te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ nam mkha'i dkyil gyi lam nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang lhan cig tu byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen

pos 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di ga la ba der song ste phyin nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad lhan cig smra ba na/ bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po bsags pa las grub pas byin pa'i rin po che de dag las 'od zer 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / ljang sngon dang /

ljang ser dang / btsod ka dang / shel dang / dngul dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / gser dang / pad+ma rA ga dang / rdo'i snying po dang / ke ke ru dang / ke ke ru chen po dang / an da rnyil dang / mthon ka chen po dang / dun las dang / go mu ta ra ga dang / mu tig dmar po'i kha dog lta bu rnams

byung ste/ de dag gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams la lan 'bum phrag du mar bskor ba byas te/ steng gi bar snang khyab par byas nas/ lha'i snang bas snang bar byas te/ 'dus nas 'ja' lta bur gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag

par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i zhabs mtshan thams cad phun sum tshogs pa/ 'jam pa/ mnyen pa/ rab tu gzhon pa/ sha rgyas pa/ snum pa/ long bu gnyis kyi rtsa mi mngon pa/ pad+ma gsar du kha bye ba lta bu/ dung dang / nya dang / rdo rje dang / rgyal mtshan

dang / lcags kyu dang / pad+ma dang / chu srin ma ka ra 'i mtshan dang ldan pa gnyis la lan 'bum phrag du mar bskor ba byas nas nub par gyur to/ /nam mkha'i dkyil na 'od zer re re'i rtse mo las pad+ma bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad cu/ tshad shing rta'i phang lo tsam pa/ rin po che sna

bdun gyi rgyu las byung ba 'di lta ste/ gser gyi rgyu las byung ba dang / an da rnyil dang / dngul dang / byi ru dang / shel dang / ke ke ru dang / dun las kyi rgyu las byung ba dag 'thon to/ /de la gser gyi rgyu las byung ba'i pad+ma rnams kyi 'dab ma ni an da rnyil gyi rgyu las byung ba dag go/ /snying po

ni dngul gyi rgyu las byung ba'o/ /ze ba ni byi ru'i rgyu las byung ba'o/ /chu ba ni shel gyi rgyu las byung ba'o/ /ze 'bru ni ke ke ru'i rgyu las byung ba'o/ /an da rnyil gyi rgyu las byung ba'i pad+ma rnams kyi 'dab ma ni dngul gyi rgyu las byung ba dag go/ /snying po ni byi ru'i rgyu las byung ba'o/ /ze ba ni shel gyi

rgyu las byung ba'o/ /chu ba ni ke ke ru'i rgyu las byung ba'o/ /ze 'bru ni dun las kyi rgyu las byung ba'o/ /dngul gyi rgyu las byung ba'i pad+ma rnams kyi 'dab ma ni byi ru'i rgyu las byung ba dag go/ /snying po ni shel gyi rgyu las byung ba'o/ /ze ba ni ke ke ru'i rgyu las byung ba'o/ /chu ba ni dun las

kyi rgyu las byung ba'o/ /ze 'bru ni gser gyi rgyu las byung ba'o/ /byi ru'i rgyu las byung ba'i pad+ma rnams kyi 'dab ma ni shel gyi rgyu las byung ba dag go/ /snying po ni ke ke ru'i rgyu las byung ba'o/ /ze ba ni dun las kyi rgyu las byung ba'o/ /chu ba ni gser gyi rgyu las byung ba'o/ /ze 'bru ni an da

rnyil gyi rgyu las byung ba'o/ /shel gyi rgyu las byung ba'i pad+ma rnams kyi 'dab ma ni ke ke ru'i rgyu las byung ba dag go/ /snying po ni dun las kyi rgyu las byung ba'o/ /ze ba ni gser gyi rgyu las byung ba'o/ /chu ba ni an da rnyil gyi rgyu las byung ba'o/ /ze 'bru ni dngul gyi rgyu las byung ba'o/ /ke ke

ru'i rgyu las byung ba'i pad+ma rnams kyi 'dab ma ni dun las kyi rgyu las byung ba dag go/ /snying po ni gser gyi rgyu las byung ba'o/ /ze ba ni an da rnyil gyi rgyu las byung ba'o/ /chu ba ni dngul gyi rgyu las byung ba'o/ /ze 'bru ni byi ru'i rgyu las byung ba'o/ /dun las kyi rgyu las byung ba'i pad+ma

rnams kyi 'dab ma ni gser gyi rgyu las byung ba dag go/ /snying po ni an da rnyil gyi rgyu las byung ba'o/ /ze ba ni dngul gyi rgyu las byung ba'o/ /chu ba ni byi ru'i rgyu las byung ba'o/ /ze 'bru ni shel gyi rgyu las byung ba'o/ /de bzhin du sbyar te de ltar rin po che rnam pa du ma'i rgyu las byung ba'i pad+ma

dag go/ /rin po che'i pad+ma re re la yangs bcu la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun du mdzes pa'i spyod lam phun sum tshogs pa dag ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' re re'i lte ba nas kyang 'od zer 'bum 'bum byung

ngo / /'od zer gyi rtse mo re re las kyang rin po che thams cad kyi rgyu las byung ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa nor bu dang / rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyi steg stegs bus bskor ba/ shel gyi rgyu las byung ba'i zla bas spras pa'i khang bran gyi rtse mo la seng ge'i rna ba'i steng na rin po che'i

rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rnam par rgyal ba'i ba dan dpyangs pas nam mkha' kun du khebs pa/ pad+ma ra ga dang / an da rnyil dang / margad dang / bai DUr+ya dang / rdo'i snying po dang / spug dang / ke ke ru las byas pa'i ka ba chen po'i klang la 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi shing

las gcod pa lta bu'i tshogs bkod pas rnam par spras te/ mdzes par byas pa/ dngul las byas pa'i phug ron gyi phreng gi mtha' mu tig dmar po dang ldan pa'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba dpyangs pa'i sgras sad par gyur nas/ rab tu dga' zhing dregs pa'i phug ron dang / bya bang

dang / ne tso dang / ri skegs dang / rma bya'i nga ro dag gis nyams dga' ba khyams dang / 'dun khang chen po'i nyen kor stegs bus bskor bas mdzes par byas pa/ rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs las byas pa'i sgo khang can/ shel gyi rgyu las byas pa'i stegs bu dang ldan pa/ bkra

shis kyi gser gyi bum pa du ma nas spos chu dri zhim pos chag chag btab pa/ rdzing chen po 'gram gyi ne'u gsing margad kyi rgyu las byung ba/ ka tsa lin da'i gos ltar reg na bde bas mdzes pa'i phyogs na bde bar nyal ba'i ngang pa dang / khrung khrung dang / ngur pa dang / ka lan dka'i khyu

gnas pa/ gser gyi bye ma bdal ba'i gtos chen po rin po che sna bdun gyi them skas kyis phreng bas brgyan pa/ yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus yongs su gang ba grangs 'bum phrag du mas kun nas yongs su bskor ba dag byung ngo / /rdzing bu re re nas kyang rin po che'i pad+ma bye ba khrag

khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu rtsa dgu byung ngo / /rin po che'i pad+ma re re'i snying po la yang sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dang / glu dbyangs rnams kyi sgra byung bas lha'i bu mo dag glu len gar byed cing yongs su spyod do/ /sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dang / glu dbyangs kyi sgra byung

ba de dag las kyang tshigs su bcad pa 'di lta bu 'di dag byung ngo / /sbyin dang tshul khrims kyis ni gang zhig dpag med cing / /de bzhin bzod dang brtson 'grus dag gi stobs ldan la/ /bsam gtan gyis ni zhi zhing dbang gis kun 'byor pa/ /ye shes sgrol ma de la skyabs su 'dong bar

gyis/ /bsam gyis mi khyab stobs dang smon lam rnams dang ldan/ /thabs dang byang chub yan lag ting 'dzin rnams kyi bdag /rnam par grol ba'i lam dang stobs bcu ldan pa yi/ /thub pa gang yin de la mchod phyir 'dong bar gyis/ /'dam rdzab nas ni pad+ma rgyas pa ji bzhin du/ /

gang zhig nyon mongs 'dam gyis rtag par mi gos pa/ /'chi dang skye ba'i sdug bsngal rnam par bsal ba yi/ /rgyal ba 'jig rten mgon po de la blta phyir dang / /gcig kyang mi ldan min par gyur pa gang zhig gis/ /skye dgu rnams kyi gti mug sgo glegs rnams bshig cing / /sku

dang gsung dang thugs kyi spyod pa rab zhi ba/ /shAkya'i tog ldan de la skyabs su 'dong bar gyis/ /de ltar khang pa brtsegs pa dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pas legs par brgyan pa/ rnam pa sna tshogs bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma nam mkha'i dkyil na kun du snang ste/ kha cig tu

ni rin po che'i sprin gyi char 'bab par kun du snang ngo / /kha cig tu ni me tog gi gdugs kyi sprin gyi char/ kha cig tu ni gor shir Sha'i tsan+dan dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma'i sprin gyi char/ kha cig tu ni gos kyi phreng ba'i sprin gyi char/ kha cig tu ni ka shi ka'i ras dang / du ku

la'i ras dang / za 'ug gi sprin gyi char/ kha cig tu ni dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa'i sprin gyi char/ kha cig tu ni me tog pad+ma dang / ut+pa la dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / dri mchog dang / a ti mug ta ka dang / ka tsa lin dad dang / ma hA ka tsa lin da dang / btang bzung dang / btang

bzung chen po dang / many+dzu Sha ka dang / many+dzu Sha ka chen po dang / man dA ra ba dang / man dA ra ba chen po'i sprin gyi char mngon par bo/ /me tog gi char de dag las dri gang byung ba des sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med grangs med pa dag gang gA'i klung gi bye ma'i rdul phra rab kyi

rdul dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams rgyas par khyab bo/ /'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sems can gang dag 'gro ba drug tu skyes pa de dag thams cad dri des mchog tu bde bas tshim zhing sems dga' bar gyur te/ sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral nas phan tshun

'dri ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed de na/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po byang chub sems dpa'i cho 'phrul sna tshogs ston pa rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo / /de dag gis de mthong nas kyang phyag 'tshal to/ /skyes bu dam pa de na phyag btsal ma thag tu sems can gang dag ngan 'gro

log par ltung bar dong ba de dag kyang mchog tu bde ba dang / dga' ba dang / ra ngas pa dang / dad pa thob nas skad cig de nyid la ngan 'gro log par ltung ba las grol te sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nang du skyes nas bar snang la 'khod de/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin

gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po la mchod pa'i sprin chen pos mchod nas lan 'bum phrag du ma mtha' yas mu med par bskor ba byas te/

de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje 'khor gyi khyams chen po thams cad dang ldan pa la lan bdun bskor ba byas nas lha rnams bar snang las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rang rang gi rin po che'i gzhal med khang gi khang pa brtsegs pa dag na/ lha'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig

'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dang / glu dbyangs kyi sgra 'byin cing tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do/ /gang slad ngan 'gro mchog tu sdug bsngal 'khrugs pa yi/ /ming yang bde

gshegs stobs kyis deng du med mdzad dang / /bsod nams mi ldan sems can rnams la'ang rgyal ba mchog /byams par mdzad pa kye ma ngo mtshar rmad du byung / /bdag cag rnams kyi rmongs pa'i snying gis bsgrubs pa yi/ /sdig pa'i las gang shin tu bgyid dka' sna tshogs

pa/ /de dag thub pa'i bya de ring lo bur du/ /skad cig tu ni ji ltar rnam par zhig par gyur/ /ji ltar gdugs kyis mun pa mun nag kun bcom dang / /ji ltar zhugs 'bar bas ni ras rnams sreg pa dang / /bser mas shing bal ltar yang sprin 'thor ji bzhin du/ /de ltar 'gro ba'i

sdig pa bde bar gshegs kyis bcom/ /bde gshegs sras po mthong ngam thos sam dran gyur na/ /lhan cig skyes dbang 'od zer dra bas sdig 'phrog pa/ /'gro ba yongs kyi srid pa'i spros pa zhig pa yi/ /thugs dang rtag tu ldan zhing skyo bar 'gyur mi mnga'/ /mig dang mgo dang snying

dang sha khrag tshil rnams dang / /srog dang sdug dang bu rnams rtswa ltar bor nas ni/ /mi mtshungs sems can don phyir thugs rjes thugs brlan pa/ /'jig rten mgon sras de dag rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ltogs la chu dang ro brgya'i zas rnams dang / /de bzhin skye bo nor

'dod snying dang ldan pa la/ /thugs rje spyod cing rnam pa sna tshogs tshim mdzad pa/ /byang chub sems dpa' khyu mchog de la skyabs su mchi/ /gang dag mnar med pa yang rab tu bsil mdzad pas/ /mchog tu tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba'ang bsil bar 'gyur/ /rang bde mi gzigs sems

can don brtson thugs ldan pa/ /'jig rten mgon sras mnyam med de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang dag srid par 'khor ba'i srid pa'i skyon las grol/ /stong pa gsung yang las kyi 'bras bu mi 'dor zhing / /ye shes me yis rnyog pa bsregs kyang thugs rjes brlan/ /spyod pa rtag

med dbang ldan de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /kye ma dpal ldan rdo rje snying po bde gshegs sras/ /mtshan gyis mtshan btab sku las 'od stong mang byung ba'i/ /dri ba rnams dang sna tshogs glu yis bdag cag sim/ /skad cig gis ni dmyal las sum cu'i lha dbang gyur/ /bdag cag

rnams kyis rgyal dang rgyal sras rnams dang ni/ /de dag rnams kyis gsungs pa mchog tu zhi chos la/ /gus bstod dge ba rgya chen de ring gang thob pa/ /des myur 'jig rten thams cad bde gshegs thob par shog /de ltar tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa rnams kyis bcom

ldan 'das la bstod nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ste/ de dag rang rang gi rin po che'i gzhal med khang gi khang pa brtsegs pa rnams su 'khod de chos nyan pa'i phyir phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos byang chub sems

dpa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen po 'di lta bu 'di bstan nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje'i 'khor gyi khyams chen po dang ldan pa la

mchod pa'i sprin chen po rnams kyis mchod nas ting nge 'dzin de las langs te bar snang las babs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu lan 'bum phrag du ma mtha' yas mu med par bskor ba byas nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po la

btsugs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das la blta'o/ /rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad kyang dga' ba dang mgu ba skyes nas de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das la blta'o/ /bltas nas kyang sgra skad kyi nga ro gcig tu bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su

bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ /dran pa'i gzhus 'phangs pa yi shes rab mda' mang gis/ /ma 'phangs mthur ldan bdud bzhi pham mdzad cing / /'jig rten nyon mongs nyen pa'i mun pa bsal mdzad nas/ /bla ma sprin med zla ba bzhin du lhang nge'o/ /dam chos

'od mang gti mug bcom pa'i dra ba yis/ /'dul ba'i pad+ma'i gnas rnams kha phye nas/ /ye shes nam mkha' che la dri med 'bar ba'i gzugs/ /nyi ma ji bzhin gdung bar bgyi ba'i bdud sde gdungs/ /mu stegs can gyi nga rgyal mtha' dag pham mdzad cing / /'gro ba'i

'dod chags rab gdung ma lus rab zhi mdzad/ /dge ba'i lo tog rtsi chen yang dag 'phel mdzad pa/ /dge ba'i char pa phab cing 'brug ltar bsgrag tu gsol/ /mgon po mu stegs can gyi wa brgya pham mdzad cing / /bdud rnams bcom ste byang chub dam par rab brnyes nas/ /

ma 'dres bsags pa'i bden pa'i stobs kyi mthu mnga' ba/ /skye ba'i 'jigs lam rab grol seng ge ji bzhin sgrogs/ /spyod pa zab cing brtan la brtag pas mi dpogs pa/ /sems can gnas gyur stobs dang ting 'dzin nor bu bkram/ /dri med chos lhun 'dul ba'i ri bo rnam

'dzin pa/ /ye shes rgya mtsho mchog khyod skye dgu mchog gtso bo/ /tshul khrims bzang po'i rtsa ba sbyin pa'i chus btab 'phel/ /byams dang bzod pa'i me tog yal ga 'khrungs pas mdzes/ /byang chub lam gyi yan lag 'bru chags 'dod byas bsten/ /bsod nams dpag

bsam shing khyod de ring ga las byung / /sum cu rtsa gnyis 'bar ba'i mtshan gyis yan lag brgyan/ /dpe byad bzang mchog rin chen man shel gyis bskor cing / /sa dang dbang dang dam chos phur pa brtan btab pa/ /lhun po bzhin du mi g.yo khyod ni 'gro la mdzes/ /de nas

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying pos byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ste/ rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po

la phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad kyang chos nyan pa'i phyir de bzhin du rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po dag la 'khod do/ /de bzhin du sbyar te de ltar lho phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal gyi snying po

brtsegs pa rnam par bsgrags pa'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams dpal 'byung ba nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i tog ces bya ba byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor te/ mdun du bdar ba nas 'jig rten

gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ongs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas rigs kyi bu de dag dang lhan cig tu rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po la phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa'i bar du'o/ /de bzhin du nub phyogs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

sangs rgyas tshe dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can zhes bya ba de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ces bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob pa/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag

khrig 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor te mdun du bdar ba nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ongs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po la 'dug cing / rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad kyang chos nyan pa'i phyir de bzhin du rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po dag la 'khod

pa'i bar du'o/ /de bzhin du byang phyogs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos mchog rang bzhin gyis rnam par nges pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba thams cad 'byung ba nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

rin po che'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor te mdun du bdar nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ongs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po la 'dug cing / rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad

kyang chos nyan pa'i phyir de bzhin du rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po dag la 'khod pa'i bar du'o/ /de bzhin du byang shar gyi phyogs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas rab gsal dbang phyug rgyal po'i sangs rgyas

kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams dpal brtsegs nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros brtan pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor te mdun du bdar ba nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ongs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis

gnang nas rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po la 'dug cing / rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad kyang chos nyan pa'i phyir de bzhin du rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po dag la 'khod pa'i bar du'o/ /de bzhin du shar lho'i mtshams na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs

pa'i sangs rgyas dbang po'i tog gi rgyal mtshan gyi rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams the tsom dang bral ba nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros bzang po zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor te mdun du bdar ba nas 'jig rten

gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ongs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po la 'dug cing rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad kyang chos nyan pa'i phyir de bzhin du rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po dag la 'khod pa'i bar du'o/ /de bzhin du lho nub kyi phyogs bcom ldan 'das de bzhin

gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che brtsegs pa nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen blo gros zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag

du mas yongs su bskor te mdun du bdar ba nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ongs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas chos nyan pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po la 'dug cing rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad kyang

chos nyan pa'i phyir de bzhin du rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po dag la 'khod pa'i bar du 'o/ /de bzhin du nub byang gi mtshams na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor te

mdun du bdar ba nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ongs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas chos nyan pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po la 'dug cing rigs kyi bu de dag kyang chos nyan pa'i phyir/ de

bzhin du rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po dag la 'khod pa'i bar du'o/ /de bzhin du 'og gi phyogs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen pad+ma la rab tu gnas pa'i ri dbang gi rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams

pad+ma bkod pa nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i blo gros zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor te mdun du bdar ba nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ongs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang

nas rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po la 'dug cing / rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad kyang chos nyan pa'i phyir de bzhin du rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po dag la 'khod pa'i bar du'o/ /de bzhin du steng gi phyogs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas

g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba'i dpal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bdud kyi tsher ma dkrugs pa nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdud kyi sgrib pa las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor te

mdun du bdar ba nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ongs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po la 'dug cing / rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad kyang chos nyan pa'i phyir de bzhin du rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po dag la 'khod pa'i bar du'o/ /de nas de'i tshe

stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa du ma bstan pas gzhal med khang dang / me tog gi sprin dang / rin po che'i sprin dang / phye ma'i sprin dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal

mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rnam par rgyal ba'i ba dan gyi sprin dang / rin po che spug dang / rdo'i snying po dang / bai DUr+ya dang / an da rnyil dang / byi ru dang / margad dang / mu tig dmar po dang / 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi sprin dang / dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa dang /

rin po che'i pad+ma du mas khebs pa'i rdzing gis legs par brgyan par gyur to/ /'jig rten gyi khams 'di ji lta ba de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab cing dpag tu med pa gzhal du med cing brjod du med par gtogs pa gang gA'i klung

gi bye ma snyed las shin tu 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis de bzhin du legs par brgyan par kun du snang ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams de dag na de bzhin gshegs pa

dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa de dag thams cad de na bzhugs bzhin du phyag g.yas pa gser gyi kha dog lta bu brkyang ste 'jam zhing mnyen la rab tu gzhon zhing pad+ma dang yal ga gzhon sha chags shing 'jam pa'i sor mo'i ngos can

gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lcags kyu dang / bum pa dang / nya dang / sgo gang dang / gzhal med khang dang / dung dang / rdo rje dang / pad+ma dang / dpal be'u dang / 'khor lo'i mtshan gyis brgyan pa/ tshe rabs bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma nas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu

phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa'i rgyu mthun pas mngon par grub pa'i dpe byad bzang pos rnam par spras pa/ sen mo zangs 'dra zhing rgyas la snum zhing srab pa'i nor bu'i mdongs kyi me tog gi 'od zer gyis mkhrig ma mdzes par gyur pa/ sems can thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin

pa dang / yang dag par mthun pa'i phyag rnams kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la yang dag par gzengs bstod pa dang / yang dag par dga' bar bya ba'i phyir spyi bo la 'khyugs nas dus gcig tu sgra skad kyi nga ro gcig gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad go bar mdzad cing 'di skad
